The Book of Ezekiel

1 and was·generated·himself in to·the ⁼¬thirtieth ⁼year in to·the ⁼fourth ⁼month to·fifth of·the ⁼month and I* I·was in to·¬midst of·the ⁼¬captivity upon of·the ⁼¬river ⁼the·one Chobar and they·were·¬opened the⁺ ⁼heavens⁺ and I·¬saw °¬appearances⁺ of·God

2 to·fifth of·the ⁼month this ⁼the ⁼year ⁼the ⁼fifth of·the ⁼¬captivity of·the ⁼king Iōakim

3 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto Iezekiēl ⁼son ¬??? °the ⁼priest in to·earth of·¬Chaldeans⁺ upon of·the ⁼¬river ⁼the·one Chobar and was·generated·himself upon °me* hand of·lord

4 and I·¬saw and ¬¡see! breath ⁼¬expelling came·himself off of·¬north and cloud ⁼great in to·him and ¬brightness ¬surrounding of·him and fire ⁼¬flashing·forth and in to·the·one to·¬midst of·him as ¬appearance of·¬molten·bronze in to·¬midst of·the ⁼fire and °¬brightness in to·him

5 and in to·the ⁼¬midst as ¬likeness of·four⁺ ⁼¬living·things⁺ and this ⁼the ⁼¬appearance of·them ¬likeness of·human upon to·them

6 and four⁺ ⁼¬faces⁺ to·the ⁼one and four⁺ ⁼wings⁺ to·the ⁼one

7 and the⁺ ⁼¬legs⁺ of·them ¬upright⁺ and ¬feathered⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·them and ¬sparks⁺ as ¬flashing·forth ⁼copper and ¬light⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼wings⁺ of·them

8 and hand of·human ¬from·beneath of·the⁺ ⁼wings⁺ of·them upon °the⁺ ⁼four⁺ ⁼¬parts⁺ of·them and the⁺ ⁼¬faces⁺ of·them ⁼the⁺ ⁼four⁺

9 not they·¬turned·themselves in to·the·one to·¬proceed °them ¬each ¬before of·the ⁼¬face of·them they·¬travelled·themselves

10 and ¬likeness of·the⁺ ⁼¬faces⁺ of·them ¬face of·human and ¬face of·lion out of·¬right⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼four⁺ and ¬face of·calf out of·¬left⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼four⁺ and ¬face of·eagle to·the⁺ ⁼four⁺

11 and the⁺ ⁼wings⁺ of·them having·self-¬stretched·out ¬from·above to·the⁺ ⁼four⁺ ¬??? two having·been·¬joined unto °one·another⁺ and two they·¬covered ¬above of·the ⁼body of·them

12 and ¬each·other ¬according·to °¬face of·it ¬travelled·himself of·which iᵮ was the ⁼breath ⁼self-¬travelling they·¬travelled·themselves and not they·¬turned

13 and in to·¬midst of·the⁺ ⁼¬living·things⁺ ¬appearance as of·¬charcoals⁺ of·fire of·self-¬kindling as ¬face of·¬windows⁺ ⁼¬gathered ¬each °¬midst of·the⁺ ⁼¬living·things⁺ and °¬brightness of·the ⁼fire and out of·the ⁼fire ¬departed·himself ¬lightning

15 and I·¬saw and ¬¡see! ¬course ⁼one upon of·the ⁼earth self-having of·the⁺ ⁼¬living·things⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼four⁺

16 and the ⁼¬appearance of·the⁺ ⁼¬courses⁺ as ¬appearance of·¬??? and ¬likeness ⁼one to·the⁺ ⁼four⁺ and the ⁼work of·them was ¬as iᵮ may·be ¬course in to·¬course

17 upon °the⁺ ⁼four⁺ ⁼¬parts⁺ of·them they·¬travelled·themselves not they·¬turned in to·the·one to·self-¬travel °them

18 not·then the⁺ ⁼¬backs⁺ of·them and ¬height was to·them and I·¬saw °them and the⁺ ⁼¬backs⁺ of·them ¬full⁺ of·¬eyes⁺ ¬around to·the⁺ ⁼four⁺

19 and in to·the·one to·self-¬travel °the⁺ ⁼¬living·things⁺ they·¬travelled·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬courses⁺ ⁼self-having of·them and in to·the·one to·¬expel °the⁺ ⁼¬living·things⁺ off of·the ⁼earth they·¬expelled·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬courses⁺

20 of·which iᵮ was the ⁼cloud there the ⁼breath of·the·one to·self-¬travel they·¬travelled·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬living·things⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬courses⁺ and they·¬expelled·themselves wiŧh to·them ¬because breath of·life was in to·the⁺ ⁼¬courses⁺

21 in to·the·one to·self-¬travel °them they·¬travelled·themselves and in to·the·one to·have·stood °them they·had·stood and in to·the·one to·¬expel °them off of·the ⁼earth they·¬expelled·themselves wiŧh to·them ¬that breath of·life was in to·the⁺ ⁼¬courses⁺

22 and ¬likeness ¬above of·head to·them of·the⁺ ⁼¬living·things⁺ ¬like ¬firmness as ¬appearance of·crystal having·been·¬stretched·out upon of·the⁺ ⁼wings⁺ of·them ¬about

23 and ¬under of·the ⁼¬firmness the⁺ ⁼wings⁺ of·them having·self-¬stretched·out ⁼self-¬flapping·wings óther to·the ⁼óther to·¬each two having·been·¬joined ⁼¬covering °the⁺ ⁼bodies⁺ of·them

24 and I·heard °the ⁼voice of·the⁺ ⁼wings⁺ of·them in to·the·one to·self-¬travel °them as °voice of·water ⁼much and in to·the·one to·have·stood °them they·¬kept·from the⁺ ⁼wings⁺ of·them

25 and ¬¡see! voice ¬far·above of·the ⁼¬firmness of·the ⁼being ¬above of·head of·them

26 as ¬appearance of·stone of·sapphire ¬likeness of·throne upon of·him and upon of·the ⁼¬likeness of·the ⁼throne ¬likeness as ¬appearance of·human ¬from·above

27 and I·¬saw as °¬face of·¬molten·bronze off of·¬appearance ⁼¬loins and ¬above and off of·¬appearance ⁼¬loins and ¬until ¬under I·¬saw as °¬appearance of·fire and °the ⁼¬brightness of·him ¬surrounding

28 as ¬appearance of·¬bow ¬when should·be in to·the ⁼cloud in to·day of·¬rain thus the ⁼¬uprising of·the ⁼¬brightness ¬around this ⁼the ⁼¬appearance of·¬likeness of·¬glory of·lord and I·¬saw and I·¬collapse upon °¬face of·me and I·heard °voice of·speaking

2 and told unto °me son of·human ꜝstand upon °the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·you and I·will·speak unto °you

2 and came upon °me* breath and ¬took·up °me and ¬expelled °me and stood °me upon °the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·me and I·heard of·him ⁼speaking unto °me

3 and told unto °me son of·human I·¬send·out I* °you unto °the ⁼house of·the ⁼Yisra’el °the⁺ ⁼¬rebelling °me whos⁺ they·¬rebelled °me they and the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·them ¬until of·the·one today of·day

4 and you·will·¬say unto °them °¬these⁺ says lord

5 ifᵮ ¬therefore they·should·hear or they·should·be·¬frightened ¬because house ⁼¬rebelling is and they·will·know·themselves ¬that ¬prophet you·are you in to·¬midst of·them

6 and you son of·human ńot you·should·be·¬feared °them ńot·then you·should·¬amaze off of·¬face of·them ¬because they·will·¬be·in·heat and they·will·¬rise·up·together·against·themselves upon °you ¬surrounding and in to·¬midst of·¬scorpions⁺ you you·¬dwell °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·them ńot you·should·be·¬feared and off of·¬face of·them ńot you·should·¬amaze ¬because house ⁼¬rebelling is

7 and you·will·speak °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me unto °them ifᵮ ¬therefore they·should·hear or they·should·be·¬frightened ¬because house ⁼¬rebelling is

8 and you son of·human ꜝhear of·the ⁼speaking unto °you ńot ꜝbe·generated·yourself ¬rebelling ¬as the ⁼house ⁼the ⁼¬rebelling ꜝ¬gape·wide °the ⁼mouth of·you and ꜝ¬eat °which⁺ I* I·give to·you

9 and I·¬saw and ¬¡see! hand ⁼having·self-¬stretched·out unto °me and in to·her ¬scroll of·¬scroll

10 and ¬unrolled °her ¬before myˊ and in to·her having·been·written was the·ones⁺ ¬after and the·ones⁺ ¬before and had·been·written to °her ¬lamentation and ¬member and ¬woe!

3 and told unto °me son of·human ꜝ¬devour °the ⁼¬scroll ⁼this and ꜝbe·¬travelled and ꜝspeak to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

2 and I·¬opened·up °the ⁼mouth of·me and ¬feeded °me °the ⁼¬scroll

3 and told unto °me son of·human the ⁼mouth of·you will·¬eat·himself and the ⁼¬belly of·you will·be·¬filled of·the ⁼¬scroll ⁼this ⁼the ⁼having·been·given to °you and I·¬ate °her and was·generated·himself in to·the ⁼mouth of·me as honey ⁼¬sweetening

4 and told unto °me son of·human ꜝ¬proceed ꜝcome·to unto °the ⁼house of·the ⁼Yisra’el and ꜝspeak °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me unto °them

5 ¬because not unto °people ⁼¬having·thick·lips and °¬unknown·language you you·will·¬send·out·yourself unto °the ⁼house of·the ⁼Yisra’el

6 not·then unto °peoples⁺ ⁼many⁺ ⁼¬foreign·language⁺ or °¬foreign·tongue⁺ not·then °¬dense⁺ to·the ⁼tongue °being of·which⁺ not you·will·hear·yourself °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·them and if unto °¬such·as·this⁺ I·¬sended·out °you these⁺ iᵮ they·¬listened·to of·you

7 then the ⁼house of·the ⁼Yisra’el not ńot they·should·¬will to·¬listen·to of·you ¬because not they·¬plan·themselves to·¬listen·to of·me ¬that all ⁼the ⁼house of·Yisra’el ¬friend·of·dispute⁺ they·are and ¬hard-hearted⁺

8 and ¬¡see! I·have·given °the ⁼¬face of·you °able ¬before of·the⁺ ⁼¬faces⁺ of·them and °the ⁼¬altercation of·you I·will·¬prevail ¬before of·the·one ¬??? of·them

9 and will·be·himself through of·all °¬mighty of·rock ńot you·should·be·¬feared off of·them ńot·then you·should·be·¬frightened off of·¬face of·them ¬because house ⁼¬rebelling is

10 and told unto °me son of·human °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼which⁺ I·have·spoken with of·you ꜝtake to °the ⁼heart of·you and to·the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·you ꜝhear

11 and ꜝ¬proceed ꜝcome·to to °the ⁼¬captivity unto °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the ⁼people of·you and you·will·speak unto °them and you·will·¬say unto °them °¬these⁺ says lord ifᵮ ¬therefore they·should·hear ifᵮ ¬therefore ¬???

12 and ¬took·up °me °breath and I·heard ¬after of·me °voice of·¬earthquake ⁼great having·been·¬praised ⁼the ⁼¬glory of·lord out of·the ⁼¬place of·him

13 and I·¬saw °voice of·wings⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬living·things⁺ of·self-¬flapping·wings óther unto °the ⁼óther and voice of·the⁺ ⁼¬courses⁺ self-having of·them and voice of·the ⁼¬earthquake

14 and the ⁼breath ¬expelled °me and ¬took·up °me and I·was·¬travelled in to·¬impulse of·the ⁼breath of·me and hand of·lord was·generated·himself upon °me* ¬mighty

15 and I·came·to to °the ⁼¬captivity ¬meteorite and I·¬went·around °the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling upon of·the ⁼¬river ⁼the·one Chobar °the⁺ ⁼being there and I·¬seated there seven °days⁺ self-¬living in to·¬midst of·them

16 and was·generated·himself with °the·ones⁺ seven °days⁺ saying of·lord unto °me saying

17 son of·human °¬goal I·have·given °you to·the ⁼house of·Yisra’el and you·will·hear·yourself out of·mouth of·me °saying and you·will·¬threaten·yourself to·them ¬from myˊ

18 in to·the·one to·say °me to·the ⁼¬lawless ⁼death you·will·be·put·to·death and not you·¬gave·orders·yourself to·him not·then you·spoke of·the·one to·self-¬give·orders to·the ⁼¬lawless to·¬turn·away off of·the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·him of·the·one to·live °him the ⁼¬lawless ⁼that to·the ⁼¬unrighteousness of·him will·die·off·himself and the ⁼blood of·him out of·hand of·you I·will·¬seek·out

19 and you ifᵮ you·should·¬give·orders·yourself to·the ⁼¬lawless and ńot should·¬turn·away off of·the ⁼¬lawlessness of·him and of·the ⁼¬road of·him the ⁼¬lawless ⁼that in to·the ⁼¬unrighteousness of·him will·die·off·himself and you °the ⁼soul of·you you·will·¬rescue·yourself

20 and in to·the·one to·¬turn·away °¬just off of·the⁺ ⁼¬justices⁺ of·him and should·do °¬trespass and I·will·give °the ⁼¬torment to °¬face of·him he will·die·off·himself ¬that not you·¬gave·orders·yourself to·him and in to·the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·him will·die·off·himself ¬because not ńot they·should·be·¬remembered the⁺ ⁼¬justices⁺ of·him °which⁺ did and °the ⁼blood of·him out of·the ⁼hand of·you I·will·¬seek·out

21 you then ifᵮ you·should·¬give·orders·yourself to·the ⁼¬just of·the·one ńot to·sin and he ńot should·sin the ⁼¬just to·life will·live·himself ¬that you·¬gave·orders·yourself to·him and you °the·one of·yourself °soul you·will·¬rescue·yourself

22 and was·generated·himself upon °me* hand of·lord and told unto °me ꜝ¬arise and ꜝcome·out to °the ⁼¬plain and there will·be·spoken unto °you

23 and I·¬arose and I·came·out to °the ⁼¬plain and ¬¡see! there ¬glory of·lord you·had·stood ¬as the ⁼¬appearance and ¬as the ⁼¬glory °which I·¬saw upon of·the ⁼¬river ⁼the·one Chobar and I·¬collapse upon °¬face of·me

24 and came upon °me* breath and stood °me upon °feet⁺ of·me and spoke unto °me and told to·me ꜝcome·to and ¬??? in to·¬midst of·the ⁼house of·you

26 and °the ⁼tongue of·you I·will·¬bind·with and you·will·be·¬been·mute and not you·will·be·yourself to·them to °man ⁼¬rebuking ¬because house ⁼¬rebelling is

27 and in to·the·one to·speak °me unto °you I·should·¬open °the ⁼mouth of·you and you·will·¬say unto °them °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼the ⁼hearing ꜝlet·them·hear and the ⁼¬disobeying ꜝlet·them·¬disobey ¬because house ⁼¬rebelling is

4 and you son of·human ꜝtake to·yourself °¬brick and you·will·¬place °her ¬before of·¬face of·you and you·will·¬circumscribe upon °her ⁼city ⁼the ⁼Yerushalam

2 and you·will·give upon °her ⁼¬passage and you·will·¬build upon °her °¬battlements⁺ and you·will·¬clothe upon °her °¬barricade and you·will·give upon °her °¬barrackses⁺ and you·will·¬appoint °the⁺ ⁼¬weaponries⁺ ¬surrounding

3 and you ꜝtake to·yourself °¬frying·pan ⁼iron and you·will·¬place °it °wall ⁼iron ¬each °¬midst of·you and ¬each °¬midst of·the ⁼city and you·will·¬make·ready °the ⁼¬face of·you upon °her and will·be·himself in to·¬confinement and you·will·¬confine °her sign is this to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

4 and you you·will·be·¬slept upon °the ⁼¬side of·you °the ⁼¬left and you·will·¬place °the⁺ ⁼¬unrighteousnesses⁺ of·the ⁼house ⁼Yisra’el upon of·him ¬according·to °¬number of·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ fifty and hundred °which⁺ you·will·be·¬slept upon of·him and you·will·take·yourself °the⁺ ⁼¬unrighteousnesses⁺ of·them

5 and I* I·have·given to·you °the·ones⁺ two °¬unrighteousnesses⁺ of·them to °¬number of·days⁺ ¬ninety and hundred °days⁺ and you·will·take·yourself °the⁺ ⁼¬unrighteousnesses⁺ of·the ⁼house ⁼Yisra’el

6 and you·will·¬complete °these⁺ ⁼all⁺ and you·will·be·¬slept upon °the ⁼¬side of·you °the ⁼¬right and you·will·take·yourself °the⁺ ⁼¬unrighteousnesses⁺ of·the ⁼house ⁼Yudah forty °days⁺ °day to °¬year I·have·¬placed to·you

7 and to °the ⁼¬confinement of·Yerushalam you·will·¬make·ready °the ⁼¬face of·you and °the ⁼arm of·you you·will·¬strengthen and you·will·¬prophesy upon °her

8 and I* ¬¡see! I·have·given upon °you °¬chains⁺ and ńot you·should·be·¬turned off of·the ⁼¬side of·you upon °the ⁼¬side of·you ¬until of·which they·should·be·¬completed the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the ⁼¬confinement of·you

9 and you ꜝtake to·yourself °¬wheats⁺ and °¬barleys⁺ and °¬bean and °¬flask and °¬millet and °¬wild·oat and you·will·throw·in °them to °¬vessel ⁼one ⁼¬clay and you·will·do °them to·yourself to °breads⁺ and ¬according·to °¬number of·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ °which⁺ you you·¬sleep upon of·the ⁼¬side of·you ¬ninety and hundred °days⁺ you·will·¬eat·yourself °them

10 and the ⁼¬food of·you °which you·will·¬eat·yourself in to·¬doorpost twenty °shekels⁺ °the ⁼day off of·¬time ¬until of·¬time you·will·¬eat·yourself °them

11 and °water in to·¬measure you·will·drink·yourself °the ⁼sixth of·the ⁼¬hin off of·¬time ¬until of·¬time you·will·drink·yourself

12 and °¬cakes ⁼¬barley you·will·¬eat·yourself °them in to·¬dungs⁺ of·¬dung ⁼human you·will·¬mix °them ¬according·to °¬eyes⁺ of·them

13 and you·will·¬say °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼the ⁼God of·the ⁼Yisra’el thus they·will·¬eat·themselves the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el °¬unclean⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺

14 and I·told ¬surely·not lord ⁼God of·the ⁼Yisra’el ¬¡see! the ⁼soul of·me not has·¬stained·himself in to·¬impurity and °¬decaying·flesh and °¬taken·by·wild·beasts not I·have·¬eaten off of·genesis of·me ¬until of·the·one now not·then has·come·to to °the ⁼mouth of·me all ⁼meat ¬???

15 and told unto °me ¬¡see! I·have·given to·you °¬dungs⁺ of·¬oxes⁺ anti of·the⁺ ⁼¬dungs⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼human⁺ and you·will·do °the⁺ ⁼breads⁺ of·you upon of·them

16 and told unto °me son of·human ¬¡see! I* I·¬break °¬reliance of·bread in to·Yerushalam and they·will·¬eat·themselves °bread in to·¬doorpost and in to·¬lack and °water in to·¬measure and in to·¬disappearance they·will·drink·themselves

17 ¬that ¬impoverished⁺ they·should·be·generated·themselves of·bread and of·water and will·be·¬destroyed human and brother of·him and they·will·¬melt·themselves in to·the⁺ ⁼¬unrighteousnesses⁺ of·them

5 and you son of·human ꜝtake to·yourself °¬sword ⁼¬sharp ¬above °¬razor of·¬barber you·should·¬possess·yourself °her to·yourself and you·will·¬bring·upon °her upon °the ⁼head of·you and upon °the ⁼beard of·you and you·will·take·yourself °¬yoke of·¬scale-weights⁺ and you·will·¬pass °them

2 °the ⁼fourth in to·fire you·will·¬kindle in to·¬midst ⁼the ⁼city ¬according·to °the ⁼¬filling of·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the ⁼¬confinement and you·will·take·yourself °the ⁼fourth and you·will·¬burn °it in to·¬midst of·her and °the ⁼fourth you·will·¬cut in to·¬sword ¬surrounding of·her and °the ⁼fourth you·will·¬scatter to·the ⁼breath and °¬sword I·will·¬empty·out ¬after of·them

3 and you·will·take·yourself ¬from·there °¬little⁺ in to·¬number and you·will·¬embrace·yourself °them to·the ⁼¬delay of·you

4 and out of·these⁺ you·will·take·yourself ¬still and you·will·¬throw °them to °¬midst of·the ⁼fire and you·will·¬burn °them in to·fire out of·her will·come·out·himself °fire and you·will·¬say to·all ⁼house of·Yisra’el

5 °¬these⁺ says lord this ⁼the ⁼Yerushalam in to·¬midst of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ I·have·¬placed °her and °the·ones⁺ ¬surrounding of·her °¬countries⁺

6 and you·will·¬say °the⁺ ⁼¬righteous·acts⁺ of·me to·the ⁼¬lawless out of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼law⁺ of·me out of·the⁺ ⁼¬countries⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬surrounding of·her ¬because °the⁺ ⁼¬righteous·acts⁺ of·me they·¬rejected·themselves and in to·the⁺ ⁼law⁺ of·me not they·were·¬travelled in to·them

7 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord anti of·which⁺ the ⁼¬opportunity of·you⁺ out of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬surrounding of·you⁺ and in to·the⁺ ⁼law⁺ of·me not you⁺·were·¬travelled and °the⁺ ⁼¬righteous·acts⁺ of·me not you⁺·did but not·then ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼¬righteous·acts⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬surrounding of·you⁺ not you⁺·have·done

8 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! I* upon °you and I·will·do in to·¬midst of·you °judgment ¬before of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺

9 and I·will·do in to·you °which⁺ not I·have·done and °which⁺ not I·will·do °¬like⁺ to·them ¬still ¬according·to °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬abominations⁺ of·you

10 through °this fathers⁺ they·will·¬eat·themselves °¬children⁺ in to·¬midst of·you and ¬children⁺ they·will·¬eat·themselves °fathers⁺ and I·will·do in to·you °judgments⁺ and I·will·¬scatter °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬remaining⁺ of·you to °all ⁼¬wind

11 through °this I·live I* says lord if ńot anti of·which⁺ °the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ of·me you·¬stained in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬abominations⁺ of·you and I* I·will·¬reject·myself °you not will·¬spare·himself of·me the ⁼¬eye and I* not I·will·¬have·mercy

12 °the ⁼fourth of·you in to·death will·be·¬consumed and °the ⁼fourth of·you in to·¬famine will·be·¬completed in to·¬midst of·you and °the ⁼fourth of·you to °all ⁼¬wind I·will·¬scatter °them and the ⁼fourth of·you in to·¬sword they·will·¬collapse·themselves ¬surrounding of·you and °¬sword I·will·¬empty·out ¬after of·them

13 and will·be·¬completed the ⁼¬wrath of·me and the ⁼¬wrath of·me upon °them and you·will·¬come·to·know·yourself ¬because I* lord I·have·spoken in to·zealousy of·me in to·the·one to·¬complete °me °the ⁼¬wrath of·me upon °them

14 and I·will·¬place·myself °you to °¬deserted and °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·you ¬surrounding of·you ¬before of·all ⁼¬going·through

15 and you·will·be·yourself ¬bemoaned and ¬??? in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬surrounding of·you in to·the·one to·do °me in to·you °judgments⁺ in to·¬vengeance of·¬wrath of·me I* lord I·have·spoken

16 in to·the·one to·¬send·out °me °the⁺ ⁼¬arrows⁺ of·me of·the ⁼¬famine upon °them and they·will·be·themselves to °¬end and I·will·¬break °¬reliance of·bread of·you

17 and I·will·¬send·out upon °you °¬famine and °¬wild·animals⁺ ⁼¬evil⁺ and I·will·¬punish·myself °you and death and blood they·will·¬pass·through·themselves upon °you and °¬sword I·will·¬bring·upon upon °you ¬around I* lord I·have·spoken

6 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

2 son of·human ꜝ¬establish °the ⁼¬face of·you upon °the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ of·Yisra’el and ꜝ¬prophesy upon °them

7 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord °the⁺ ⁼corpses⁺ of·you⁺ °which⁺ you⁺·¬struck in to·¬midst of·her these⁺ they·are the⁺ ⁼meats⁺ she then the ⁼¬kettle is and °you⁺ I·will·¬lead·out out of·¬midst of·her

8 °¬sword you⁺·¬fear·yourselves⁺ and °¬sword I·will·¬bring·upon upon °you⁺ says lord

9 and I·will·¬lead·out °you⁺ out of·¬midst of·her and I·will·¬deliver °you⁺ to °hands⁺ of·¬another's⁺ and I·will·do in to·you⁺ °judgments⁺

10 in to·¬sword you⁺·will·¬collapse·yourselves⁺ upon of·the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ of·the ⁼Yisra’el I·will·judge °you⁺ and you⁺·will·¬come·to·know·yourselves⁺ ¬that I* lord

11 she to·you⁺ not will·be·himself to °¬kettle and you⁺ not ńot you⁺·should·be·generated·yourselves⁺ in to·¬midst of·her to °meats⁺ upon of·the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ of·the ⁼Yisra’el I·will·judge °you⁺

12 and you⁺·will·¬come·to·know·yourselves⁺ ¬because I* lord

13 and was·generated·himself in to·the·one to·¬prophesy °me and Faltias ⁼the·one of·the Banaiou died·off and I·¬collapse upon °¬face of·me and I·¬cried·out to·voice ⁼great and I·told ¬alas! ¬alas! lord to °¬consummation you you·do °the⁺ ⁼¬remaining⁺ of·the ⁼Yisra’el

14 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

15 son of·human the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·you and the⁺ ⁼men⁺ of·the ⁼¬captivity of·you and all ⁼the ⁼house of·the ⁼Yisra’el has·been·¬completed to·which⁺ they·told to·them the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling °Yerushalam ¬far you⁺·¬have·in·full off of·the ⁼lord to·us has·given·himself the ⁼earth to °¬inheritance

16 through °this ꜝtell °¬these⁺ says lord ¬that I·will·¬reject·myself °them to °the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ and I·will·¬scatter °them to °all ⁼the ⁼earth and I·will·be·myself to·them to °¬sanctification ⁼¬small in to·the⁺ ⁼¬countries⁺ of·which iᵮ they·should·come·to there

17 through °this ꜝtell °¬these⁺ says lord and I·will·¬receive·myself °them out of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ and I·will·¬assemble °them out of·the⁺ ⁼¬countries⁺ of·which I·¬scattered °them in to·them and I·will·give to·them °the ⁼earth of·the ⁼Yisra’el

18 and they·will·come·to·themselves there and they·will·¬expel °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬abominations⁺ of·her and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·her out of·her

19 and I·will·give to·them °heart ⁼óther and °breath ⁼¬new I·will·give in to·them and I·will·¬pull·out °the ⁼heart ⁼the ⁼stone out of·the ⁼flesh of·them and I·will·give to·them °heart ⁼fleshly

20 ¬that in to·the⁺ ⁼¬orders⁺ of·me they·should·¬travel·themselves and the⁺ ⁼¬righteous·acts⁺ of·me they·should·¬keep·themselves and they·should·do °them and they·will·be·themselves to·me to °people and I* I·will·be·myself to·them to °God

21 and to °the ⁼heart of·the⁺ ⁼¬abominations⁺ of·them and of·the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·them as the ⁼heart of·them ¬travelled·himself °the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·them to °heads⁺ of·them I·have·given says lord

22 and they·¬expelled the⁺ ⁼¬Cherubs⁺ °the⁺ ⁼wings⁺ of·them and the⁺ ⁼¬courses⁺ ⁼self-having of·them and the ⁼¬glory of·God ⁼Yisra’el upon °them ¬above of·them

23 and ¬ascended the ⁼¬glory of·lord out of·¬midst ⁼the ⁼city and stood upon of·the ⁼mountain which was ¬opposite of·the ⁼city

24 and ¬took·up °me breath and ¬brought °me to °earth of·¬Chaldeans⁺ to °the ⁼¬captivity in to·¬appearance in to·breath of·God and I·¬ascended off of·the ⁼¬appearance ⁼which I·¬saw

25 and I·spoke unto °the ⁼¬captivity °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·the ⁼lord °which⁺ ¬showed to·me

12 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

2 son of·human in to·¬midst of·the⁺ ⁼¬unrighteousnesses⁺ of·them you you·¬dwell which⁺ they·have °¬eyes⁺ of·the·one to·look and not they·look and °ears⁺ they·have of·the·one to·hear and not they·hear ¬because house ⁼¬rebelling is

3 and you son of·human ꜝdo to·yourself °¬vessels⁺ of·¬captivity ⁼day ¬before of·them and you·will·be·¬taken·captive out of·the ⁼¬place of·you to °óther ⁼¬place ¬before of·them ¬that they·should·¬see ¬because house ⁼¬rebelling is

4 and you·will·¬bring °the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ of·you as °¬vessels⁺ of·¬captivity ⁼day ¬according·to °¬eyes⁺ of·them and you you·will·come·out·yourself of·¬evening as ¬departs·himself ¬captive

5 ¬before of·them ꜝ¬break·in to·yourself to °the ⁼wall and you·will·¬go·through·yourself through of·him

6 ¬before of·them upon of·shoulders⁺ you·will·be·¬taken·up and having·been·¬hidden you·will·come·out·yourself the ⁼¬face of·you you·will·¬conceal and not ńot you·should·¬see °the ⁼earth ¬because °¬wonders I·have·given °you to·the ⁼house of·Yisra’el

7 and I·did thus ¬according·to °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ ¬ordered·himself to·me and °¬vessels⁺ I·¬brought as °¬vessels⁺ of·¬captivity ⁼day and of·¬evening I·¬broke·in to·myself °the ⁼wall and having·been·¬hidden I·came·out upon of·shoulders⁺ I·was·¬taken·up ¬before of·them

8 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me °the·one ¬early saying

9 son of·human not they·told unto °you the ⁼house of·the ⁼Yisra’el house ⁼the ⁼¬rebelling °what you you·do

10 ꜝtell unto °them °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼lord ⁼the ⁼¬ruler and the ⁼self-¬guiding in to·Yerushalam and to·all ⁼house ⁼Yisra’el which⁺ they·are in to·¬midst of·them

11 ꜝtell ¬that I* °¬wonders I·do in to·¬midst of·her °which ⁼¬way I·have·done thus will·be·himself to·them in to·¬deportation and in to·¬captivity they·will·¬travel·themselves

12 and the ⁼¬ruler in to·¬midst of·them upon of·shoulders⁺ will·be·¬taken·up and having·been·¬hidden will·come·out·himself through of·the ⁼wall and will·¬break·in of·the·one to·come·out °him through of·him °the ⁼¬face of·him will·¬conceal ¬that ńot should·be·¬seen to·¬eye and he °the ⁼earth not will·¬see·himself

13 and I·will·¬extend °the ⁼¬net of·me upon °him and will·be·¬seized in to·the ⁼¬passage of·me and I·will·¬bring °him to °¬Babylon to °earth of·¬Chaldeans⁺ and °her not will·¬see·himself and there will·¬decease

14 and °all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬surrounding of·him °the⁺ ⁼¬helpers⁺ of·him and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬helping of·him I·will·¬scatter to °all ⁼¬wind and °¬sword I·will·¬empty·out ¬after of·them

15 and they·will·know·themselves ¬because I* lord in to·the·one to·¬scatter °me °them in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ and I·will·¬scatter °them in to·the⁺ ⁼¬countries⁺

16 and I·will·¬leave·myself out of·them °men⁺ to·¬number out of·¬sword and out of·¬famine and out of·death ¬that they·should·¬tell·in·detail·themselves °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·them in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ of·which they·came·to there and they·will·know·themselves ¬that I* lord

17 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

18 son of·human °the ⁼bread of·you with of·¬anguish you·will·¬eat·yourself and °the ⁼water of·you with of·¬torment and of·¬pressure you·will·drink·yourself

19 and you·will·¬say unto °the ⁼people of·the ⁼earth °¬these⁺ says lord to·the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling °Yerushalam upon of·the ⁼earth of·the ⁼Yisra’el °the⁺ ⁼breads⁺ of·them with of·¬lack they·will·¬eat·themselves and °the ⁼water of·them with of·¬disappearance they·will·drink·themselves ¬that should·be·¬destroyed the ⁼earth wiŧh to·¬fulfillment of·her in to·¬ungodlinessness for all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling in to·her

20 and the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·them the⁺ ⁼self-¬dwelling they·will·be·¬made·desolate and the ⁼earth to °¬disappearance will·be·himself and you⁺·will·¬come·to·know·yourselves⁺ ¬because I* lord

21 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

22 son of·human what to·you⁺ the ⁼¬parable ⁼this upon of·the ⁼earth of·the ⁼Yisra’el saying ¬far the⁺ ⁼days⁺ has·¬destroyed ¬appearance

23 through °this ꜝtell unto °them °¬these⁺ says lord I·will·¬turn·away °the ⁼¬parable ⁼this and ¬not·any·more ńot they·should·tell °the ⁼¬parable ⁼this house of·the ⁼Yisra’el ¬that you·will·speak unto °them they·have·¬come·near the⁺ ⁼days⁺ and saying of·all ⁼¬appearance

24 ¬that not will·be·himself ¬still all ⁼¬appearance ⁼lying and self-¬divining °the·ones⁺ unto °¬grace in to·¬midst of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

25 ¬because I* lord I·will·speak °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me I·will·speak and I·will·do and not ńot I·¬grow ¬still ¬that in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·you⁺ house ⁼the ⁼¬rebelling I·will·speak °saying and I·will·do says lord

26 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

27 son of·human ¬¡see! house of·Yisra’el the ⁼¬rebelling saying they·say the ⁼¬appearance °which this ¬sees to °days⁺ ⁼many⁺ and to °¬times⁺ ⁼¬long⁺ this ¬prophesies

28 through °this ꜝtell unto °them °¬these⁺ says lord not ńot they·should·¬grow ¬not·any·more all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me °which⁺ iᵮ I·will·speak I·will·speak and I·will·do says lord

13 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

2 son of·human ꜝ¬prophesy upon °the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ of·the ⁼Yisra’el and you·will·¬prophesy and you·will·¬say unto °them ꜝhear⁺ °saying of·lord

3 °¬these⁺ says lord ¬woe! to·the·ones⁺ ¬prophesying off of·heart of·them and °the·one ¬at·all ńot they·look

4 the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ of·you Yisra’el as foxes⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼¬deserteds⁺

5 not they·stood in to·¬firmness and they·¬assembled °¬flocks⁺ upon °the ⁼house of·the ⁼Yisra’el not they·¬arose the⁺ ⁼saying in to·day of·lord

6 looking °lying⁺ self-¬divining °¬futile⁺ the⁺ ⁼saying says lord and lord not has·missioned·off °them and they·¬were·first·themselves of·the·one to·¬arise °saying

7 not °¬appearance °lying⁺ you⁺·have·¬seen and °¬divinations⁺ ⁼¬futile⁺ you⁺·have·¬said

8 through °this ꜝtell °¬these⁺ says lord anti of·which⁺ the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·you⁺ lying⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬divinations⁺ of·you⁺ ¬futile⁺ through °this ¬¡see! I* upon °you⁺ says lord

9 and I·will·¬stretch·out °the ⁼hand of·me upon °the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬seeing °lying⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼self-¬declaring °¬futile⁺ in to·¬discipline of·the ⁼people of·me not they·will·be·themselves not·then in to·writing of·house ⁼Yisra’el not they·will·be·written and to °the ⁼earth of·the ⁼Yisra’el not they·will·come·to·themselves and they·will·know·themselves ¬because I* lord

10 anti of·which⁺ °the ⁼people of·me they·¬led·astray saying peace ⁼peace and not was peace and this ¬builds °wall and they they·¬anoint °him if will·¬collapse·himself

11 ꜝtell unto °the⁺ ⁼¬anointing will·¬collapse·himself and will·be·himself ¬rain ⁼¬flooding and I·will·give °stones⁺ ⁼¬slinger⁺ to °the⁺ ⁼¬bondings⁺ of·them and they·will·¬collapse·themselves and °breath ⁼¬expelling and will·be·¬thrown·violently

12 and ¬¡see! has·¬collapsed the ⁼wall and not they·will·¬say unto °you⁺ ¬where? is the ⁼¬ointment of·you⁺ °which you⁺·¬anointed

13 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord and I·will·¬throw·violently °breath ⁼¬expelling with of·¬wrath and ¬rain ⁼¬flooding in to·¬wrath of·me will·be·himself and °the⁺ ⁼stones⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬slinger⁺ in to·¬wrath I·will·¬bring·upon to °¬consummation

14 and I·will·¬ruin °the ⁼wall ⁼which you⁺·¬anointed and will·¬collapse·himself and I·will·¬place °him upon °the ⁼earth and will·be·¬revealed the⁺ ⁼¬foundations⁺ of·him and will·¬collapse·himself and you⁺·will·be·¬completed with of·¬rebukes⁺ and you⁺·will·¬come·to·know·yourselves⁺ ¬because I* lord

15 and I·will·¬complete °the ⁼¬wrath of·me upon °the ⁼wall and upon °the⁺ ⁼¬anointing °him and will·¬collapse·himself and I·told unto °you⁺ not is the ⁼wall not·then the⁺ ⁼¬anointing °him

16 ¬prophets⁺ of·the ⁼Yisra’el the⁺ ⁼¬prophesying upon °Yerushalam and the⁺ ⁼¬seeing to·her °peace and peace not is says lord

17 and you son of·human ꜝ¬establish °the ⁼¬face of·you upon °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·the ⁼people of·you °the⁺ ⁼¬prophesying off of·heart of·them and ꜝ¬prophesy upon °them

18 and you·will·¬say °¬these⁺ says lord ¬woe! to·the⁺ ⁼¬sewing·together °¬cushions⁺ upon °all ⁼¬angle of·hand and to·doing °¬coverings⁺ upon °all ⁼head of·all ⁼¬age of·the·one to·¬pervert °souls⁺ the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ they·were·¬perverted of·the ⁼people of·me and °souls⁺ they·¬gained·themselves

19 and they·¬profaned °me unto °the ⁼people of·me ¬because·of of·¬handful of·¬barleys⁺ and ¬because·of of·¬fragments⁺ of·bread of·the·one to·kill·off °souls⁺ ⁼which⁺ not will·¬be·necessary to·die·off and of·the·one to·self-¬gain °souls⁺ ⁼which⁺ not will·¬be·necessary to·live in to·the·one to·self-¬declare °you⁺ to·people ⁼¬listening·to °¬futile⁺ ⁼¬maxims⁺

20 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼lord ¬¡see! I* upon °the⁺ ⁼¬cushions⁺ of·you⁺ upon °which⁺ you⁺ you⁺·¬gather there °souls⁺ and I·will·¬tear °them off of·the⁺ ⁼arms⁺ of·you⁺ and I·will·¬send·out °the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ ⁼which⁺ you⁺ you⁺·¬are·warped °the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ of·them to °¬exile

21 and I·will·¬tear °the⁺ ⁼¬coverings⁺ of·you⁺ and I·will·¬rescue·myself °the ⁼people of·me out of·hand of·you⁺ and ¬not·any·more they·will·be·themselves in to·hands⁺ of·you⁺ to °¬commotion and you⁺·will·¬come·to·know·yourselves⁺ ¬because I* lord

22 anti of·which⁺ you⁺·¬perverted °heart of·¬just ¬unjustly and I* not I·¬perverted °him and of·the·one to·¬prevail °hands⁺ of·¬lawless °the·one ¬at·all ńot to·¬turn·away off of·the ⁼¬road of·him of·the ⁼¬evil and to·live °him

23 through °this °lying⁺ not ńot you⁺·should·¬see and °¬divinations⁺ not ńot you⁺·should·¬divine·yourselves⁺ ¬still and I·will·¬rescue·myself °the ⁼people of·me out of·hand of·you⁺ and you⁺·will·know·yourselves⁺ ¬that I* lord

14 and they·came unto °me men⁺ out of·the⁺ ⁼¬elder⁺ of·the ⁼Yisra’el and they·¬seated ¬before of·¬face of·me

2 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

3 son of·human the⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼these⁺ they·¬placed·themselves °the⁺ ⁼¬thoughts⁺ of·them upon °the⁺ ⁼hearts⁺ of·them and °the ⁼¬punishment of·the⁺ ⁼¬unrighteousnesses⁺ of·them they·¬placed ¬before of·¬face of·them if ¬answered I·should·be·¬answered to·them

4 through °this ꜝspeak to·them and you·will·¬say unto °them °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼human ⁼human out of·the ⁼house ⁼Yisra’el which iᵮ should·¬place °the⁺ ⁼¬thoughts⁺ of·him upon °the ⁼heart of·him and °the ⁼¬punishment of·the ⁼¬unrighteousness of·him should·¬appoint ¬before of·¬face of·him and should·come unto °the ⁼¬prophet I* lord I·will·be·¬answered to·him in to·which⁺ ¬opposes·himself the ⁼¬mind of·him

5 ¬that should·¬bend °the ⁼house of·the ⁼Yisra’el ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼hearts⁺ of·them °the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬alienated off myˊ in to·the⁺ ⁼¬thoughts⁺ of·them

6 through °this ꜝtell unto °the ⁼house of·the ⁼Yisra’el °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼lord ꜝbe⁺·¬turned and ꜝ¬turn·away⁺ off of·the⁺ ⁼¬practices⁺ of·you⁺ and off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬ungodlinessnesses⁺ of·you⁺ and ꜝ¬turn⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬faces⁺ of·you⁺

7 ¬because human ⁼human out of·the ⁼house ⁼Yisra’el and out of·the⁺ ⁼¬proselytes⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬converting in to·the ⁼Yisra’el which iᵮ should·be·¬alienated off myˊ and should·¬place·himself °the⁺ ⁼¬thoughts⁺ of·him upon °the ⁼heart of·him and °the ⁼¬punishment of·the ⁼¬unrighteousness of·him should·¬appoint ¬before of·¬face of·him and should·come unto °the ⁼¬prophet of·the·one to·¬question °him in to·me* I* lord I·will·be·¬answered to·him in to·which ¬opposes·himself in to·him

8 and I·will·¬establish °the ⁼¬face of·me upon °the ⁼human ⁼that and I·will·¬place·myself °him to °¬deserted and to °¬disappearance and I·will·¬expel °him out of·¬midst of·the ⁼people of·me and you⁺·will·¬come·to·know·yourselves⁺ ¬that I* lord

9 and the ⁼¬prophet ifᵮ should·be·¬led·astray and should·speak I* lord I·have·¬led·astray °the ⁼¬prophet ⁼that and I·will·¬stretch·out °the ⁼hand of·me upon °him and I·will·¬destroy °him out of·¬midst of·the ⁼people of·me of·Yisra’el

10 and they·will·take·themselves °the ⁼¬unrighteousness of·them ¬according·to °the ⁼¬crime of·the ⁼¬questioning and ¬according·to °the ⁼¬crime ¬similarly to·the ⁼¬prophet will·be·himself

11 ¬that ńot should·¬lead·astray·himself ¬still the ⁼house of·the ⁼Yisra’el off myˊ and so·that ńot they·should·¬stain·themselves ¬still in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬trespasses⁺ of·them and they·will·be·themselves to·me to °people and I* I·will·be·myself to·them to °God says lord

12 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

13 son of·human earth ifᵮ should·sin to·me of·the·one to·¬defect °¬trespass and I·will·¬stretch·out °the ⁼hand of·me upon °her and I·will·¬break of·her °¬reliance of·bread and I·will·¬send·out upon °her °¬famine and I·will·¬expel out of·her °human and °¬animals⁺

14 and ifᵮ they·should·be the⁺ ⁼three⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼these⁺ in to·¬midst of·her ¬Noah and ¬Daniel and ¬Job they in to·the ⁼¬justice of·them they·will·be·¬saved says lord

15 ifᵮ and °¬wild·animals⁺ ⁼¬evil⁺ I·¬bring·upon upon °the ⁼earth and I·will·¬punish·myself °her and will·be·himself to °¬disappearance and not will·be·himself the ⁼¬going·through off of·¬face of·the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺

16 and the⁺ ⁼three⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼these⁺ in to·¬midst of·her they·should·be I·live I* says lord if sons⁺ or daughters⁺ they·will·be·¬saved but or they ⁼¬alone⁺ they·will·be·¬saved then the ⁼earth will·be·himself to °¬destructive

17 or and °¬sword ifᵮ I·¬bring·upon upon °the ⁼earth ⁼that and I·should·tell ¬sword ꜝlet·them·¬pass·through through of·the ⁼earth and I·will·¬expel out of·her °human and °¬animal

18 and the⁺ ⁼three⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼these⁺ in to·¬midst of·her I·live I* says lord not ńot they·should·¬rescue·themselves °sons⁺ not·then °daughters⁺ they ⁼¬alone⁺ they·will·be·¬saved

19 or and °death ¬??? upon °the ⁼earth ⁼that and I·will·¬pour·out °the ⁼¬wrath of·me upon °her in to·blood of·the·one to·¬root·out out of·her °human and °¬animal

20 and ¬Noah and ¬Daniel and ¬Job in to·¬midst of·her I·live I* says lord ifᵮ sons⁺ or daughters⁺ they·should·be·¬left they in to·the ⁼¬justice of·them they·will·¬rescue·themselves °the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ of·them

21 °¬these⁺ says lord ifᵮ then and °the⁺ ⁼four⁺ ⁼¬vengeances⁺ of·me °the⁺ ⁼¬evil⁺ °¬sword and °¬famine and °¬wild·animals⁺ ⁼¬evil⁺ and °death I·should·¬send·out upon °Yerushalam of·the·one to·¬root·out out of·her °human and °¬animal

22 and ¬¡see! having·been·¬left in to·her the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬escaped of·her which⁺ they·¬lead·out out of·her °sons⁺ and °daughters⁺ ¬¡see! they they·¬depart·themselves unto °you⁺ and you⁺·will·¬see·yourselves⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼¬thoughts⁺ of·them and you⁺·will·be·¬repented upon °the⁺ ⁼evil⁺ ⁼which⁺ I·¬brought·upon upon °Yerushalam °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼evil⁺ ⁼which⁺ I·¬brought·upon upon °her

23 and they·will·¬plead °you⁺ ¬because you⁺·will·¬see·yourselves⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼¬thoughts⁺ of·them and you⁺·will·¬come·to·know·yourselves⁺ ¬because not ¬in·vain I·have·done °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ I·did in to·her says lord

15 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

2 and you son of·human °what iᵮ may·be·generated·himself the ⁼¬wood of·the ⁼vine out of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬woods⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬branches⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼being in to·the⁺ ⁼¬woods⁺ of·the ⁼¬grove

3 if they·will·take·themselves out of·her °¬wood of·the·one to·do to °¬work if they·will·take·themselves out of·her °¬peg of·the·one to·¬hang upon °him °all ⁼¬vessel

4 ¬besides to·fire has·given·himself to °¬consumption ⁼the·one ¬according·to °¬year °¬cleansing off of·her ¬consumes the ⁼fire and ¬fails to °¬goal ńot ¬profitable will·be·himself to °¬work

5 not·then ¬still of·it ⁼being ⁼¬whole not will·be·himself to °¬work ńot ¬that ifᵮ and fire °it should·¬consume to °¬goal if will·be·himself ¬still to °¬work

6 through °this ꜝtell °¬these⁺ says lord °which ⁼¬way the ⁼¬wood of·the ⁼vine in to·the⁺ ⁼¬woods⁺ of·the ⁼¬grove °which I·have·given °it to·the ⁼fire to °¬consumption thus I·have·given °the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling °Yerushalam

7 and I·will·give °the ⁼¬face of·me upon °them out of·the ⁼fire they·will·come·out·themselves and fire °them will·¬devour·himself and they·will·¬come·to·know·themselves ¬that I* lord in to·the·one to·¬establish °me °the ⁼¬face of·me upon °them

8 and I·will·give °the ⁼earth to °¬disappearance anti of·which⁺ they·¬defected to·¬trespass says lord

16 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

2 son of·human ꜝ¬testify·solemnly·yourself to·the ⁼Yerushalam °the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·her

3 and you·will·¬say °¬these⁺ says lord to·the ⁼Yerushalam the ⁼root of·you and the ⁼genesis of·you out of·earth of·¬Canaan the ⁼father of·you Amorraios and the ⁼mother of·you Chettaia

4 and the ⁼genesis of·you in to·which ⁼day you·were·¬given·birth·to not they·¬bound °the⁺ ⁼¬breasts⁺ of·you and in to·water not you·were·¬washed not·then to·¬salt you·were·¬salted and to·¬swaddling·cloths⁺ not you·were·¬wrapped

5 not·then ¬spared·himself the ⁼¬eye of·me upon to·you of·the·one to·do to·you °one out of·all⁺ ⁼these⁺ of·the·one to·¬suffer °whatever upon to·you and you·were·¬thrown·off upon °¬face of·the ⁼¬plain to·the ⁼¬deformity of·the ⁼soul of·you in to·which ⁼day you·were·¬given·birth·to

6 and I·¬passed·through upon °you and I·¬saw °you °having·been·¬befouled in to·the ⁼blood of·you and I·¬said to·you out of·the ⁼blood of·you life

7 ꜝ¬multiply·yourself ¬as the ⁼¬east of·the ⁼field I·have·given °you and you·were·¬multiplied and you·were·¬magnified and you·came·to to °cities⁺ of·cities⁺ the⁺ ⁼¬breasts⁺ of·you they·were·¬restored and the ⁼hair of·you ¬rised you then you·were naked and ¬acting·improperly

8 and I·¬passed·through through of·you and I·¬saw °you and ¬¡see! ¬time of·you ¬time of·¬destroying and I·¬opened·and·spread·out °the⁺ ⁼wings⁺ of·me upon °you and I·¬covered °the ⁼¬indecency of·you and I·¬sweared to·you and I·came·to in to·¬covenant with of·you says lord and you·were·generated·yourself to·me

9 and I·¬washed °you in to·water and I·¬washed·off °the ⁼blood of·you off of·you and I·christened °you in to·¬olive·oil

10 and I·¬put·on °you °¬various⁺ and I·¬put·on °you °hyacinth and I·¬dressed °you to·¬fine·linen and I·¬clothed °you to·¬braid

11 and I·cosmosed °you to·cosmos and I·¬put·on °¬bracelets⁺ about °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·you and °¬necklace about °the ⁼neck of·you

12 and I·gave °¬ring about °the ⁼¬nostril of·you and °¬discs⁺ upon °the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·you and °¬crown of·¬pride upon °the ⁼head of·you

13 and you·were·cosmosed to·gold and to·silver and the⁺ ⁼¬coverings⁺ of·you ¬fine·linen⁺ and ¬braid⁺ and ¬various⁺ °¬fine·flour and °¬olive·oil and °honey you·¬ate and you·were·generated·yourself beautiful ¬very

14 and came·out of·you name in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ in to·the ⁼¬beauty of·you ¬because having·been·¬completed was in to·¬beauty in to·the ⁼¬beauty ⁼which I·¬appointed upon °you says lord

15 and you·had·¬persuaded in to·the ⁼¬beauty of·you and you·fornicated upon to·the ⁼name of·you and you·¬poured·out °the ⁼fornication of·you upon °all ⁼¬passing·by °which not will·be·himself

16 and you·took out of·the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ of·you and you·did to·yourself °idols⁺ ⁼¬strung·together⁺ and you·fornicated·out upon °them and not ńot you·should·come·to not·then ńot should·be·generated·himself

17 and you·took °the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ of·the ⁼¬pride of·you out of·the ⁼gold of·me and out of·the ⁼silver of·me out of·which⁺ I·gave to·you and you·did to·yourself °¬images⁺ ⁼¬male⁺ and you·fornicated·out in to·them

18 and you·took °the ⁼cloak ⁼the ⁼¬various of·you and you·¬clothed °them and °the ⁼¬olive·oil of·me and °the ⁼¬incense of·me you·¬placed ¬before of·¬face of·them

19 and °the⁺ ⁼breads⁺ of·me °which⁺ I·gave to·you °¬fine·flour and °¬olive·oil and °honey I·¬feeded °you and you·¬placed °them ¬before of·¬face of·them to °¬aroma of·¬aroma and was·generated·himself says lord

20 and you·took °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you and °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·you °which⁺ you·engendered and you·¬sacrificed °them to·them to °¬consumption as °¬small⁺ you·fornicated·out

21 and you·¬slaughtered °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you and you·gave °them in to·the·one to·self-¬pacify °you in to·them

22 this ¬from °all ⁼the ⁼fornication of·you and not you·were·¬remembered °the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the ⁼¬infancy of·you when you·were naked and ¬acting·improperly and having·self-¬befouled in to·the ⁼blood of·you you·lived

23 and was·generated·himself with °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼evils⁺ of·you says lord

24 and you·¬built to·yourself °¬cell ⁼¬of·a·harlot and you·did to·yourself °¬public·notice in to·all ⁼¬street

25 and upon of·¬beginning ⁼all ⁼¬road you·¬built °the⁺ ⁼fornications⁺ of·you and you·¬ravaged·yourself °the ⁼¬beauty of·you and you·¬lived °the⁺ ⁼¬legs⁺ of·you to·all ⁼¬passing·by and you·¬multiplied °the ⁼fornication of·you

26 and you·fornicated·out upon °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Egypt °the⁺ ⁼¬adjoining to·you °the⁺ ⁼¬fleshy⁺ and ¬in·many·ways you·fornicated·out of·the·one to·¬anger °me

27 ifᵮ then you·¬stretched·out·yourself °the ⁼hand of·me upon °you and I·will·¬expel °the⁺ ⁼law⁺ of·you and I·will·¬deliver °you to °souls⁺ of·¬hating °you °daughters⁺ of·¬foreign⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬turning·from °you out of·the ⁼¬road of·you of·which you·¬were·ungodly

28 and you·fornicated·out upon °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ Assour and not·then thus you·were·¬filled·up and you·fornicated·out and not I·¬fill·up

29 and you·¬multiplied °the⁺ ⁼¬covenants⁺ of·you unto °earth of·¬Chaldeans⁺ and not·then in to·these⁺ you·were·¬filled·up

30 °what I·should·¬make·a·covenant °the ⁼daughter of·you says lord in to·the·one to·do °you °these⁺ ⁼all⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·woman ⁼fornicator and you·fornicated·out ¬third

31 in to·the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·you °the ⁼¬place·of·harlotry of·you you·¬built upon of·all ⁼¬beginning ⁼¬road and °the ⁼¬foot of·you you·did in to·all ⁼¬street and you·were·generated·yourself as fornicator ⁼¬assembling °¬rented·homes⁺

32 the ⁼woman ⁼the ⁼self-adulterizing ⁼¬like to·you ¬from of·the ⁼man of·her taking °¬rented·homes⁺

33 to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼fornicating·out °her ¬gave·in·addition °¬rented·homes⁺ and you you·have·given °¬rented·homes⁺ to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬lovers⁺ of·you and you·¬burdened °them of·the·one to·self-come unto °you ¬around in to·the ⁼fornication of·you

34 and was·generated·himself in to·you °having·self-¬perverted ¬from °the⁺ ⁼women⁺ in to·the ⁼fornication of·you and with of·you they·have·fornicated in to·the·one to·¬give·in·addition °you °¬rented·homes⁺ and to·you ¬rented·homes⁺ not was·given and was·generated·himself in to·you °having·self-¬perverted

35 through °this fornicator ꜝhear °saying of·lord

36 °¬these⁺ says lord anti of·which⁺ you·¬poured·out °the ⁼copper of·you and will·be·¬revealed the ⁼¬shame of·you in to·the ⁼fornication of·you unto °the⁺ ⁼¬lovers⁺ of·you and to °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬thoughts⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·you and in to·the⁺ ⁼bloods⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you of·which⁺ you·gave to·them

37 through °this ¬¡see! I* upon °you I·¬assemble °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬lovers⁺ of·you in to·which⁺ you·were·¬intermixed in to·them and °all⁺ ⁼which⁺ you·loved wiŧh to·all⁺ ⁼which⁺ you·¬hated and I·will·¬assemble °them upon °you ¬around and I·will·¬reveal °the⁺ ⁼evils⁺ of·you unto °them and they·will·¬see·themselves °all ⁼the ⁼¬shame of·you

38 and I·will·¬avenge °you to·¬vengeance of·adulterous and of·¬pouring·out °blood and I·will·¬place °you in to·blood of·¬wrath and of·zealousy

39 and I·will·¬deliver °you to °hands⁺ of·them and they·will·¬ruin °the ⁼¬place·of·harlotry of·you and they·will·¬take·down °the ⁼¬foot of·you and they·will·¬strip °you °the ⁼cloak of·you and they·will·take·themselves °the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ of·the ⁼¬pride of·you and they·will·¬release °you °naked and °¬acting·improperly

40 and they·will·¬bring upon °you °¬crowds⁺ and they·will·¬stone °you in to·stones⁺ and they·will·¬slaughter °you in to·the⁺ ⁼¬knife-blades⁺ of·them

41 and they·will·¬burn °the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·you to·fire and they·will·do in to·you °¬vengeances⁺ ¬before of·women⁺ ⁼many⁺ and I·will·¬turn·away °you out of·the ⁼fornication of·you and °¬rented·homes⁺ not ńot you·should·give ¬not·any·more

43 anti of·which⁺ not you·were·¬remembered °the ⁼day of·the ⁼¬infancy of·you and you·¬grieved °me in to·all⁺ ⁼these⁺ and I* ¬¡see! °the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·you to °head of·you I·have·given says lord and thus you·did °the ⁼¬ungodlinessness upon to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·you

44 these⁺ is all⁺ °whatever⁺ they·told ¬according·to of·you in to·¬parable saying ¬as the ⁼mother and the ⁼daughter

45 ⁼daughter of·the ⁼mother of·you you you·are the ⁼self-¬rejecting °the ⁼man of·her and the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·her and sister of·the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·you of·the⁺ ⁼self-¬rejecting °the⁺ ⁼men⁺ of·them and the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·them the ⁼mother of·you⁺ Chettaia and the ⁼father of·you⁺ Amorraios

47 and not·then as in to·the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·them you·were·¬travelled not·then ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·them you·did ¬from °¬small and you·¬have·precedence·yourself °them in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·you

48 I·live I* says lord if has·done ¬Sodom ⁼the ⁼sister of·you she and the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·her °which ⁼¬way you·did you and the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·you

49 ¬but °this ⁼the ⁼¬violation·of·law of·¬Sodoms⁺ of·the ⁼sister of·you ¬pride in to·¬gratification of·breads⁺ and in to·¬prosperity of·wine they·¬indulged she and the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·her °this ¬was·already to·her and to·the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·her and °hand of·¬poor and of·¬poor not they·¬helped·themselves

50 and they·¬boasted and they·did °¬violation·of·laws⁺ ¬before of·me and I·¬expelled °them ¬as I·¬saw

51 and ¬Samaria ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼¬half⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·you not sinned and you·¬multiplied °the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·you ¬above °them and you·¬justified °the⁺ ⁼sisters⁺ of·you in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·you to·which⁺ you·did

58 °the⁺ ⁼¬ungodlinessnesses⁺ of·you and °the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·you you you·have·¬received·yourself °them says lord

3 and you·will·¬say °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼the ⁼eagle ⁼the ⁼great ⁼the ⁼¬having·large·wings ⁼the ⁼¬long to·the ⁼¬stretching·out ¬full of·¬claws⁺ which has °the ⁼¬leading to·come·to to °the ⁼¬frankincense and took °the⁺ ⁼¬chosen⁺ of·the ⁼¬Kidron

4 °the⁺ ⁼¬end⁺ of·the ⁼¬tenderness ¬plucked·off and ¬bore °them to °earth of·¬Canaan to °city ⁼having·self-walled ¬placed·himself °them

5 and took off of·the ⁼seed of·the ⁼earth and gave °it to °the ⁼¬plain ⁼¬plant upon to·water ⁼much °self-¬looking·upon ¬appointed °it

9 through °this ꜝtell °¬these⁺ says lord if will·¬guide ¬not! the⁺ ⁼roots⁺ of·the ⁼¬tenderness of·her and the ⁼fruit will·be·¬rotted and will·be·dried·up all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬sprouting·up·early of·her and not in to·arm ⁼great not·then in to·people ⁼much of·the·one to·¬pull·out °her out of·roots⁺ of·her

11 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

12 son of·human ꜝtell ¬so unto °the ⁼house ⁼the ⁼¬rebelling not you⁺·¬know·yourselves⁺ °what was these⁺ ꜝtell ¬when should·come king of·¬Babylon upon °Yerushalam and will·take·himself °the ⁼king of·her and °the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·her and will·¬bring °them unto °himself to °¬Babylon

13 and will·take·himself out of·the ⁼seed of·the ⁼kingdom and will·¬make·a·covenant·himself unto °him °¬covenant and will·¬bring·in °him in to·¬curse and °the⁺ ⁼self-¬governing of·the ⁼earth will·take·himself

14 of·the·one to·self-be·generated to °kingdom ⁼¬weak °the·one ¬at·all ńot to·self-¬lift·up of·the·one to·¬keep °the ⁼¬covenant of·him and to·stand °her

15 and will·¬leave·himself off of·him of·the·one to·¬send·out °¬announcers⁺ of·himself to °Egypt of·the·one to·give to·him °horses⁺ and °people ⁼much if will·¬guide if will·be·¬saved the ⁼doing °¬hostile⁺ and ¬transgressing °¬covenant if will·be·¬saved

16 I·live I* says lord ifᵮ ńot in to·which ⁼¬place the ⁼king ⁼the ⁼becoming·king °him which ¬disgraced °the ⁼¬curse of·me and which ¬transgressed °the ⁼¬covenant of·me with of·him in to·¬midst of·¬Babylon will·¬decease

17 and not in to·ability ⁼great not·then in to·¬crowd ⁼much will·do unto °him ¬Pharaoh °¬war in to·¬palisade and in to·¬building of·¬weaponries⁺ of·the·one to·¬expel °souls⁺

18 and ¬disgraced °¬oath of·the·one to·¬transgress °¬covenant and ¬¡see! has·given °the ⁼hand of·him and °all⁺ ⁼these⁺ did to·him ńot will·be·¬saved

19 through °this ꜝtell °¬these⁺ says lord I·live I* ifᵮ ńot °the ⁼¬covenant of·me °which ¬transgressed and °the ⁼¬oath of·me °which ¬disgraced and I·will·give °them to °head of·him

20 and I·will·¬extend upon °him °the ⁼¬net of·me and will·¬capture·himself in to·the ⁼¬passage of·him

21 in to·all ⁼¬battle·array of·him in to·¬sword they·will·¬collapse·themselves and °the⁺ ⁼¬remaining⁺ to °all ⁼¬wind I·will·¬scatter and you⁺·will·¬come·to·know·yourselves⁺ ¬because I* lord I·have·spoken

22 ¬because °¬these⁺ says lord and I·will·take·myself I* out of·the⁺ ⁼¬chosen⁺ of·the ⁼¬Kidron out of·¬head ⁼heart of·them I·will·¬pluck·off and I·will·¬plant I* upon °mountain ⁼¬high and I·will·¬hang °him

23 in to·mountain ⁼¬meteorite of·the ⁼Yisra’el and I·will·¬plant and will·¬bring °¬sprout and will·do °fruit and will·be·himself to °¬Kidron ⁼great and will·¬give·rest·himself ¬under of·him all ⁼¬wild·animal and all ⁼wingling ¬by °the ⁼¬shadow of·him will·¬give·rest·himself the⁺ ⁼¬branches⁺ of·him will·be·¬restored

24 and they·will·know·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬woods⁺ of·the ⁼¬plain ¬because I* lord ⁼the ⁼¬humbling °¬wood ⁼¬high and ¬lifting·up °¬wood ⁼¬lowly and drying·up °¬wood ⁼green and ¬renewing °¬wood ⁼¬dried·up I* lord I·have·spoken and I·will·do

18 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

2 son of·human °what to·you⁺ the ⁼¬parable ⁼this in to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el saying ⁼the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ they·¬ate °¬unripe·grape and the⁺ ⁼teeth⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ they·¬had·a·toothache

3 I·live I* says lord ifᵮ should·be·generated·himself ¬still self-saying ⁼the ⁼¬parable ⁼this in to·the ⁼Yisra’el

4 ¬that all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ my they·are °which ⁼¬way the ⁼soul of·the ⁼father thus and the ⁼soul of·the ⁼son my they·are the ⁼soul ⁼the ⁼sinning ⁼this will·die·off·himself

5 then the ⁼human ⁼which will·be·himself ¬just ⁼the ⁼doing °judgment and °¬justice

6 upon of·the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ not will·¬eat·himself and °the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·him not ńot should·¬lift·up unto °the⁺ ⁼¬thoughts⁺ of·house ⁼Yisra’el and °the ⁼woman of·the ⁼¬neighbor of·him not ńot should·¬stain and unto °woman in to·¬menstruation °being not will·¬approach

7 and °human not ńot should·¬oppress °¬collateral of·¬owing will·¬pay and °¬prey not will·¬seize·himself °the ⁼bread of·him to·the ⁼hungering will·give and °naked will·¬clothe

8 and °the ⁼silver of·him upon to·¬interest not will·give and °¬usury not will·take·himself and out of·¬unrighteousness will·¬turn·away °the ⁼hand of·him °judgment ⁼¬just will·do ¬each °¬midst of·man and ¬each °¬midst of·the ⁼¬neighbor of·him

9 and to·the⁺ ⁼¬orders⁺ of·me has·¬travelled·himself and °the⁺ ⁼¬righteous·acts⁺ of·me has·¬kept·himself of·the·one to·do °them ¬just ⁼this is to·life will·live·himself says lord

10 and ifᵮ should·engender °son ⁼¬pestilence ⁼¬pouring·out °blood and °doing °¬sins⁺

11 in to·the ⁼¬road of·the ⁼father of·him ⁼the ⁼¬just not was·¬travelled but and upon of·the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ ¬ate and °the ⁼woman of·the ⁼¬neighbor of·him ¬stained

12 and °¬poor and °¬poor ¬oppressed and °¬prey ¬seized and °¬collateral not ¬payed and to °the⁺ ⁼idols⁺ ¬placed·himself °the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·him °¬lawlessness has·done

13 with of·¬interest gave and °¬usury took this to·life not will·live·himself °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ ⁼these⁺ did to·death will·be·put·to·death the ⁼blood of·him upon °him will·be·himself

14 ifᵮ then should·engender °son and should·¬see °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·the ⁼father of·him °which⁺ did and should·be·¬feared and ńot should·do ¬according·to °these⁺

15 upon of·the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ not has·¬eaten and °the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·him not ¬placed·himself to °the⁺ ⁼¬thoughts⁺ of·house ⁼Yisra’el and °the ⁼woman of·the ⁼¬neighbor of·him not ¬stained

18 then the ⁼father of·him ifᵮ to·¬pressure you·will·¬press·on·yourself and should·¬seize °¬prey °¬hostile⁺ did in to·¬midst of·the ⁼people of·me and will·die·off·himself in to·the ⁼¬unrighteousness of·him

19 and you⁺·will·¬say °what ¬that not took °the ⁼¬unrighteousness the ⁼son of·the ⁼father of·him ¬that the ⁼son °¬justice and °mercy did °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼law⁺ of·me ¬preserved and did °them to·life will·live·himself

20 then the ⁼soul ⁼the ⁼sinning will·die·off·himself then the ⁼son not will·take·himself °the ⁼¬unrighteousness of·the ⁼father of·him not·then the ⁼father will·take·himself °the ⁼¬unrighteousness of·the ⁼son of·him ¬justice of·¬just upon °him will·be·himself and ¬lawlessness of·¬lawless upon °him will·be·himself

21 and the ⁼¬lawless ifᵮ you·will·¬turn·away·yourself out of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·him of·which⁺ did and should·¬keep·himself °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬commandments⁺ of·me and should·do °¬justice and °mercy to·life will·live·himself not ńot should·die·off

19 and you ꜝtake °¬lamentation upon °the ⁼¬ruler of·the ⁼Yisra’el

2 and you·will·¬say °what the ⁼mother of·you ¬cub in to·¬midst of·lions⁺ was·been·generated in to·¬midst of·lions⁺ ¬multiplied °¬cubs⁺ of·her

3 and ¬leaped·back one of·the⁺ ⁼¬cubs⁺ of·her lion was·generated·himself and studied of·the·one to·¬seize °¬preys⁺ °humans⁺ ¬ate

4 and they·heard ¬according·to of·him nations⁺ in to·the ⁼¬decay of·them was·¬seized and they·¬brought °him in to·¬muzzle to °earth of·Egypt

9 and they·¬placed·themselves °him in to·¬muzzle and in to·¬wicker·cage came unto °king of·¬Babylon and ¬brought·in °him to °¬prison ¬that ńot should·be·heard the ⁼voice of·him upon °the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ of·the ⁼Yisra’el

10 the ⁼mother of·you as vine as ¬flower in to·¬pomegranate in to·water having·self-¬planted the ⁼fruit of·her and the ⁼¬sprout of·her was·generated·himself out of·water ⁼much

17 ꜝ¬yell and ꜝ¬wail son of·human ¬that she was·generated·himself in to·the ⁼people of·me she in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬guiding of·the ⁼Yisra’el they·will·¬be·a·stranger upon to·¬sword was·generated·himself in to·the ⁼people of·me through °this ꜝ¬clap upon °the ⁼hand of·you

18 ¬that has·been·¬justified and °what if and ¬tribe was·¬rejected not will·be·himself says lord ⁼lord

3 and ꜝtell upon °the ⁼house ⁼the ⁼¬rebelling °¬parable and you·will·¬say unto °them °¬these⁺ says lord ꜝ¬approach °the ⁼¬kettle and ꜝ¬pour·out to °him °water

5 out of·¬chosen⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ ⁼having·self-taken and ꜝ¬fire·up °the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ ¬under of·them ¬was·fervent ¬was·fervent and has·touched·himself the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·her in to·¬midst of·her

6 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord ¬oh! city of·bloods⁺ ¬kettle in to·which is ¬poison in to·him and the ⁼¬poison not came·out out of·her ¬according·to °¬member of·her ¬brought not ¬collapsed upon °her ¬lot

7 ¬that °blood of·her in to·¬midst of·her is upon °¬smooth·rock I·have·¬appointed °it not I·have·¬poured·out °it upon °the ⁼earth of·the·one to·¬cover upon °it °earth

8 of·the·one to·¬ascend °¬wrath to °¬vengeance to·be·¬avenged I·have·given °the ⁼blood of·her upon °¬smooth·rock of·the·one ńot to·¬cover °it

9 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord and I* I·will·¬magnify °the ⁼¬firebrand

10 and I·will·¬multiply °the⁺ ⁼¬woods⁺ and I·will·¬kindle °the ⁼fire ¬that should·¬melt °the⁺ ⁼meats⁺ and should·be·¬made·less the ⁼¬broth

11 and should·stand upon °the⁺ ⁼¬charcoals⁺ ¬that should·be·¬been·burnt·through and should·be·¬warmed the ⁼copper of·her and should·¬melt in to·¬midst of·¬impurity of·her and should·¬fail the ⁼¬poison of·her

12 and not ńot should·come·out out of·her much ⁼the ⁼¬poison of·her will·be·¬dishonored the ⁼¬poison of·her

13 anti of·which⁺ you·¬stained·yourself you and °what ifᵮ ńot you·should·be·¬cleaned ¬still ¬until of·which I·will·¬fill·up °the ⁼¬wrath of·me

14 I* lord I·have·spoken and will·¬come and I·will·do not I·will·¬give·orders not·then ńot I·will·¬have·mercy ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·you and ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼¬thoughts⁺ of·you I·will·judge °you says lord through °this I* I·will·judge °you ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼bloods⁺ of·you and ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼¬thoughts⁺ of·you I·will·judge °you the ⁼¬unclean ⁼the ⁼¬famous and much of·the·one to·¬rebel

30 and they·will·¬wail upon °you to·the ⁼voice of·them and they·will·¬cry·themselves °¬bitter and they·will·¬put upon °the ⁼head of·them °earth and °¬ashes they·will·¬spread·themselves

33 °¬how·much ⁼whatever you·found °¬wage off of·the ⁼sea you·¬filled·up °nations⁺ off of·the ⁼¬multitude of·you and off of·the ⁼¬consolidation of·you you·enriched °all⁺ ⁼kings⁺ of·the ⁼earth

34 now you·were·¬broken in to·sea in to·¬deep of·water the ⁼¬consolidation of·you and all ⁼the ⁼¬synagogue of·you in to·¬midst of·you they·¬collapsed all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬oarsmans⁺ of·you

35 all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling °the⁺ ⁼¬islands⁺ they·¬were·gloomy upon °you and the⁺ ⁼kings⁺ of·them to·¬amazement they·¬amazed and ¬wept °the ⁼¬face of·them

28 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

2 and you son of·human ꜝtell to·the ⁼¬ruler of·¬Tyre °¬these⁺ says lord anti of·which⁺ was·¬lifted·up of·you the ⁼heart and you·told God I·am I* °¬dwelling of·God I·have·¬dwelled in to·heart of·sea you then you·are human and not God and you·gave °the ⁼heart of·you as °heart of·God

3 ńot wise you·are you of·the ⁼¬Daniel wise⁺ not they·¬instructed °you to·the ⁼¬higher·knowledge of·them

4 ńot in to·the ⁼¬higher·knowledge of·you or in to·the ⁼¬understanding of·you you·did to·yourself °ability and °gold and °silver in to·the⁺ ⁼treasures⁺ of·you

5 in to·the ⁼much ⁼¬higher·knowledge of·you and to·¬trade of·you you·¬multiplied °ability of·you was·¬lifted·up the ⁼heart of·you in to·the ⁼ability of·you

6 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord ¬since you·have·given °the ⁼heart of·you as °heart of·God

7 anti of·this ¬¡see! I* I·¬bring·upon upon °you °¬another's⁺ ⁼¬pestilences⁺ off of·nations⁺ and ¬??? °the⁺ ⁼¬swords⁺ of·them upon °you and upon °the ⁼¬beauty of·the ⁼¬higher·knowledge of·you and they·will·¬spread °the ⁼¬beauty of·you to °¬destruction

8 and they·will·¬bring·down °you and you·will·die·off·yourself to·death of·trauma-deads⁺ in to·heart of·sea

9 ńot saying you·will·¬say God I·am I* ¬before of·the⁺ ⁼¬killing °you you then you·are human and not God in to·¬multitude

10 of·¬uncircumcised⁺ you·will·¬destroy·yourself in to·hands⁺ of·¬another's⁺ ¬that I* I·spoke says lord

11 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

12 son of·human ꜝtake °¬lamentation upon °the ⁼¬ruler of·¬Tyre and ꜝtell to·him °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼lord you ¬seal of·¬likeness and ¬crown of·¬beauty

13 in to·the ⁼¬self-indulgence of·the ⁼¬paradise ⁼the ⁼God you·were·been·generated all °stone ⁼¬good you·have·¬bound·in·yourself °¬sardion and °topaz and °¬emerald and °¬charcoal and °sapphire and °jasper and °silver and °gold and °¬amber and °¬agate and °¬amethyst and °¬chrysolite and °beryl and °¬onyx and of·gold you·¬filled·up °the⁺ ⁼treasures⁺ of·you and °the⁺ ⁼¬storehouses⁺ of·you in to·you off of·which ⁼day you·were·¬created you

14 with of·the ⁼¬Cherub I·¬placed °you in to·mountain ⁼holy of·God you·were·been·generated in to·¬midst of·stones⁺ ⁼¬fiery⁺

15 you·were·been·generated ¬blameless you in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·you off of·which ⁼day you you·were·¬created ¬until was·found the⁺ ⁼¬crimes⁺ in to·you

16 off of·¬multitude of·the ⁼¬trade of·you you·¬filled °the⁺ ⁼¬inner·rooms⁺ of·you of·¬lawlessness and you·sinned and you·were·traumatized off of·mountain of·the ⁼God and ¬brought °you the ⁼¬Cherub out of·¬midst of·stones⁺ ⁼¬fiery⁺

17 was·¬lifted·up the ⁼heart of·you upon to·the ⁼¬beauty of·you was·¬destroyed the ⁼¬higher·knowledge of·you with of·the ⁼¬beauty of·you through °¬multitude of·sins⁺ of·you upon °the ⁼earth I·¬threw °you ¬in·front·of of·kings⁺ I·gave °you to·be·¬disgraced

18 through °the ⁼¬multitude of·the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·you and of·the⁺ ⁼¬unrighteousnesses⁺ of·the ⁼¬trade of·you you·¬profaned °the⁺ ⁼¬temples⁺ of·you and I·will·¬lead·out °fire out of·¬midst of·you °this will·¬devour·himself °you and I·will·give °you to °¬ashes upon of·the ⁼earth of·you ¬in·front·of of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬seeing °you

19 and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬approaching °you in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ they·will·¬be·gloomy upon °you ¬destruction you·were·generated·yourself and not you·will·¬be·already ¬still to °the ⁼eternity

20 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

21 son of·human ꜝ¬establish °the ⁼¬face of·you upon °¬Sidon and ꜝ¬prophesy upon °her

22 and ꜝtell °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! I* upon °you ¬Sidon and I·will·be·¬been·glorified in to·you and you·will·know·yourself ¬that I* I·am lord in to·the·one to·do °me in to·you °judgments⁺ and I·will·be·made·holy in to·you

23 °blood and death in to·the⁺ ⁼¬street⁺ of·you and they·will·¬collapse·themselves having·been·traumatized in to·¬swords⁺ in to·you ¬surrounding of·you and they·will·know·themselves ¬because I* I·am lord

24 and not they·will·be·themselves ¬not·any·more to·the ⁼house of·the ⁼Yisra’el ¬thorn of·¬bitterness and ¬thorn of·¬anguish off of·all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬surrounding of·them ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬dishonoring °them and they·will·know·themselves ¬that I* I·am lord

25 °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼lord and I·will·¬assemble °the ⁼Yisra’el out of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ of·which they·were·¬scattered there and I·will·be·made·holy in to·them ¬before of·the⁺ ⁼peoples⁺ and of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ and they·will·¬dwell upon of·the ⁼earth of·them °which I·have·given to·the ⁼servant of·me to·Ya‘aqob

26 and they·will·¬dwell upon of·her in to·¬hope and they·will·¬build °houses⁺ and they·will·¬plant °vineyards⁺ and they·will·¬dwell in to·¬hope ¬when I·will·do °judgment in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬dishonoring °them in to·the·ones⁺ ¬surrounding of·them and they·will·know·themselves ¬that I* I·am lord ⁼the ⁼God of·them and the ⁼God of·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·them

29 in to·the ⁼year ⁼the ⁼tenth in to·the ⁼tenth ⁼month to·one of·the ⁼month was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

2 son of·human ꜝ¬establish °the ⁼¬face of·you upon °¬Pharaoh ⁼king of·Egypt and ꜝ¬prophesy upon °him and upon °Egypt ⁼¬all

3 and ꜝtell °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! I* upon °¬Pharaoh ⁼the ⁼dragon ⁼the ⁼great ⁼the ⁼self-¬lying·in·wait in to·¬midst of·¬rivers⁺ of·him °the ⁼saying to·me* they·are the⁺ ⁼¬rivers⁺ and I* I·did °them

4 and I* I·will·give °¬traps⁺ to °the⁺ ⁼¬cheeks⁺ of·you and I·will·¬join °the⁺ ⁼fishes⁺ of·the ⁼¬river of·you unto °the⁺ ⁼wings⁺ of·you and I·will·¬lead °you out of·¬midst ⁼the ⁼¬river of·you and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼fishes⁺ of·the ⁼¬river of·you

5 and I·will·¬lay °you in to·¬quick and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼fishes⁺ of·the ⁼¬river of·you upon °¬face of·the ⁼¬plain you·will·¬collapse·yourself and not ńot you·should·be·¬assembled and not ńot you·should·be·¬screened to·the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼earth and to·the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ of·the ⁼heaven I·have·given °you to °¬thing·devoured

6 and they·will·know·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling °Egypt ¬that I* I·am lord anti of·which⁺ you·were·been·generated ¬rod ⁼¬of·reed to·the ⁼house of·Yisra’el

7 when they·¬caught·themselves of·you to·the ⁼hand of·them you·were·¬crushed and when ¬prevailed upon °them all ⁼hand and when they·¬rested·themselves upon °you you·were·¬broken and you·¬broke·in·pieces·together of·them °all ⁼¬loins

8 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! I* I·¬bring·upon upon °you °¬sword and I·will·¬destroy °humans⁺ off of·you and °¬animals⁺

9 and will·be·himself the ⁼earth of·Egypt ¬destruction and ¬deserted and they·will·know·themselves ¬that I* I·am lord anti of·the·one to·say °you the⁺ ⁼¬rivers⁺ to·me* they·are and I* I·did °them

10 through °this ¬¡see! I* upon °you and upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬rivers⁺ of·you and I·will·give °earth of·Egypt to °¬deserted and °¬sword and °¬destruction off Magdōlou and Suēnēs and ¬until of·¬regions⁺ of·Ethiopians⁺

11 not ńot should·¬pass·through in to·her foot of·human and foot of·¬animal not ńot should·¬pass·through °her and not will·be·¬dwelled forty °years⁺

12 and I·will·give °the ⁼earth of·her °¬destruction in to·¬midst of·earth ⁼having·been·¬layed·waste and the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·her in to·¬midst of·cities⁺ ⁼having·been·¬layed·waste they·will·be·themselves forty °years⁺ and I·will·¬scatter °Egypt in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ and I·will·¬crush °them to °the⁺ ⁼¬countries⁺

13 °¬these⁺ says lord with forty °years⁺ I·will·¬assemble °the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ off of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ of·which they·were·¬scattered there

14 and I·will·¬turn·away °the ⁼¬captivity of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ and ¬??? °them in to·earth Pathourēs in to·the ⁼earth ¬whence they·were·taken and will·be·himself ¬beginning ⁼¬lowly

15 ¬from °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬beginnings⁺ not ńot should·be·¬lifted·up ¬still upon °the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ and °¬very·few⁺ °them I·will·do of·the·one ńot to·be °them ⁼¬greater⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺

16 and ¬not·any·more they·will·be·themselves to·the ⁼house of·Yisra’el to °¬hope ⁼¬reminding ⁼¬lawlessness in to·the·one °them to·¬follow ¬after of·them and they·will·know·themselves ¬that I* I·am lord

31 and was·generated·himself in to·the ⁼eleventh ⁼year in to·the ⁼third ⁼month to·one of·the ⁼month was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

2 son of·human ꜝtell unto °¬Pharaoh ⁼king of·Egypt and to·the ⁼¬multitude of·him to·what you·¬likened °yourself in to·the ⁼¬height of·you

3 ¬¡see! Assour ¬cypress in to·the ⁼¬frankincense and beautiful to·the⁺ ⁼¬shoots⁺ and ¬high to·the ⁼¬greatness to °¬midst of·clouds⁺ was·generated·himself the ⁼¬beginning of·him

4 water ¬nourished °him the ⁼abyss ¬lifted·up °him °the⁺ ⁼¬rivers⁺ of·her ¬brought ¬surrounding of·the⁺ ⁼¬plants⁺ of·him and °the·ones⁺ ¬??? of·her ¬sended·out to °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬woods⁺ of·the ⁼¬plain

6 in to·the⁺ ⁼¬shoots⁺ of·him they·¬nested all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ of·the ⁼heaven and ¬under of·the⁺ ⁼¬branches⁺ of·him they·engendered all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼¬plain in to·the ⁼¬shadow of·him ¬dwelled all ⁼¬multitude of·nations⁺

7 and was·generated·himself beautiful in to·the ⁼¬height of·him through °the ⁼¬multitude of·the⁺ ⁼¬branches⁺ of·him ¬that they·were·been·generated the⁺ ⁼roots⁺ of·him to °water ⁼much

8 ¬cypresses⁺ ⁼¬such·as·this⁺ not they·were·been·generated in to·the ⁼¬paradise of·the ⁼God and ¬pine·trees⁺ not ¬like⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼¬shoots⁺ of·him and ¬fir·trees⁺ not they·were·generated·themselves ¬like⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼¬branches⁺ of·him all ⁼¬wood in to·the ⁼¬paradise of·the ⁼God not was·¬likened to·him in to·the ⁼¬beauty of·him

9 through °the ⁼¬multitude of·the⁺ ⁼¬branches⁺ of·him and was·zealous °him the⁺ ⁼¬woods⁺ of·the ⁼¬paradise of·the ⁼¬self-indulgence of·the ⁼God

10 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord anti of·which⁺ you·were·generated·yourself great to·the ⁼¬greatness and you·gave °the ⁼¬beginning of·you to °¬midst of·clouds⁺ and I·¬saw in to·the·one to·be·¬lifted·up °him

11 and I·¬delivered °him to °hands⁺ of·¬ruler of·nations⁺ and did °the ⁼¬destruction of·him

12 and they·¬rooted·out °him ¬another's⁺ ⁼¬pestilences⁺ off of·nations⁺ and they·¬layed °him upon of·the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬valleys⁺ they·¬collapsed the⁺ ⁼¬branches⁺ of·him and was·¬broken the⁺ ⁼¬sticks⁺ of·him in to·all ⁼¬plain of·the ⁼earth and they·¬came off of·the ⁼¬shelter of·them all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼peoples⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ and they·¬razed °him

13 upon °the ⁼¬fall of·him they·¬gave·rest·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ of·the ⁼heaven and upon °the⁺ ⁼¬sticks⁺ of·him they·were·generated·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼field

14 ¬that ńot they·should·be·¬lifted·up in to·the ⁼¬greatness of·them all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬woods⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ in to·the ⁼water and not they·gave °the ⁼¬beginning of·them to °¬midst of·clouds⁺ and not they·stood in to·the ⁼¬height of·them unto °them all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼drinking °water all⁺ they·were·given to °death to of·earth °¬depth in to·¬midst of·sons⁺ ⁼humans⁺ unto °¬coming to °¬cesspool

15 °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼lord in to·which ⁼day ¬came to of·¬hell ¬mourned °him the ⁼abyss and I·¬approached °the⁺ ⁼¬rivers⁺ of·her and I·¬prevented °¬multitude of·water and ¬darkened upon °him the Libanos all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬woods⁺ of·the ⁼¬plain upon to·him they·were·¬fainted

16 off of·the ⁼voice ⁼the ⁼¬fall of·him they·were·¬shaken the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ when I·¬brought·down °him to of·¬hell with of·the⁺ ⁼¬coming to °¬pit and they·¬pleaded °him in to·earth all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬woods⁺ of·the ⁼¬self-indulgence and the⁺ ⁼¬select⁺ of·the Libanou all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼drinking °water

17 and for they they·¬came with of·him to of·¬hell in to·the⁺ ⁼trauma-deads⁺ off °¬swords⁺ and the ⁼seed of·him the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling ¬by °the ⁼¬shelter of·him in to·¬midst of·the ⁼life of·them they·¬destroyed·themselves

18 to·what you·were·¬likened ꜝbe·¬come and ꜝbe·¬brought·down with of·the⁺ ⁼¬woods⁺ of·the ⁼¬self-indulgence to of·earth °¬depth in to·¬midst of·¬uncircumcised⁺ you·will·be·¬slept with of·trauma-deads⁺ °¬swords⁺ thus ¬Pharaoh and the ⁼¬multitude of·the ⁼¬strength of·him says lord ⁼lord

32 and was·generated·himself in to·the ⁼eleventh ⁼year in to·the ⁼twelfth ⁼month to·one of·the ⁼month was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

2 son of·human ꜝtake °¬lamentation upon °¬Pharaoh ⁼king of·Egypt and you·will·¬say to·him ⁼lion of·nations⁺ you·were·¬likened and you as dragon ⁼the·one in to·the ⁼sea and you·¬butted to·the⁺ ⁼¬rivers⁺ of·you and you·¬troubled °water to·the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·you and you·¬trampled °the⁺ ⁼¬rivers⁺ of·you

3 °¬these⁺ says lord and I·will·¬clothe upon °you °¬nets⁺ of·peoples⁺ ⁼many⁺ and I·will·¬lead °you in to·the ⁼¬fishhook of·me

4 and I·will·¬stretch·out °you upon °the ⁼earth °¬plains⁺ will·be·¬filled of·you and I·will·¬sit·on upon °you °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ of·the ⁼heaven and I·will·¬fill·up out of·you °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·all ⁼the ⁼earth

5 and I·will·give °the⁺ ⁼fleshes⁺ of·you upon °the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ and I·will·¬fill·up off of·the ⁼blood of·you

6 and will·be·¬watered the ⁼earth off of·the·ones⁺ ¬??? of·you off of·the ⁼¬multitude of·you upon of·the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ °¬valleys⁺ I·will·¬fill·up off of·you

7 and I·will·¬cover in to·the·one to·be·¬extinguished °you °heaven and I·will·¬darken °the⁺ ⁼stars⁺ of·him °sun in to·cloud I·will·¬cover and luna not ńot should·be·¬shined °the ⁼light of·her

8 all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬shining light in to·the ⁼heaven they·will·¬darken upon °you and I·will·give °¬darkness upon °the ⁼earth of·you says lord ⁼lord

9 and I·will·¬anger °heart of·peoples⁺ ⁼many⁺ ¬when iᵮ I·¬bring °¬captivity of·you to °the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ to °earth ⁼which not you·knew

10 and they·will·¬be·gloomy upon °you nations⁺ ⁼many⁺ and the⁺ ⁼kings⁺ of·them to·¬amazement they·will·¬amaze·themselves in to·the·one to·self-wing °the ⁼¬sword of·me upon °¬faces⁺ of·them self-¬waiting·for °the ⁼¬fall of·them off of·day ⁼¬fall of·you

11 ¬that °¬these⁺ says lord ¬sword of·king of·¬Babylon will·¬come to·you

12 in to·¬swords⁺ of·¬giants⁺ and I·will·¬lay °the ⁼¬strength of·you ¬pestilences⁺ off of·nations⁺ all⁺ and they·will·¬destroy °the ⁼¬mistreatment of·Egypt and will·be·¬broken all ⁼the ⁼¬strength of·her

13 and I·will·¬destroy °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·her off of·water ⁼much and not ńot should·¬trouble °it ¬still foot of·human and ¬track of·¬animals⁺ not ńot should·¬trample °it

14 thus ŧhen will·¬be·quiet the⁺ ⁼waters⁺ of·them and the⁺ ⁼¬rivers⁺ of·them as ¬olive·oil they·will·¬travel·themselves says lord

15 ¬when I·should·give °Egypt to °¬destruction and should·be·¬layed·waste the ⁼earth wiŧh to·the ⁼¬filling of·her ¬when I·should·¬scatter °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling in to·her and they·will·know·themselves ¬that I* I·am lord

16 ⁼¬lamentation is and you·will·¬lament °him and the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ they·will·¬lament °him upon °Egypt and upon °all ⁼the ⁼¬strength of·her they·will·¬lament °her says lord ⁼lord

17 and was·been·generated in to·the ⁼twelfth ⁼year of·the ⁼first ⁼month to·five-and-tenth of·the ⁼month was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

18 son of·human ꜝ¬lament upon °the ⁼¬strength of·Egypt and they·will·¬bring·down of·her °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ °the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ °corpse⁺ to °the ⁼¬depth of·the ⁼earth unto °the⁺ ⁼¬coming to °¬cesspool

20 in to·¬midst of·trauma-deads⁺ °¬swords⁺ they·will·¬collapse·themselves with of·him and will·be·¬slept all ⁼the ⁼¬strength of·him

21 and they·will·¬say to·you the⁺ ⁼¬giants⁺ in to·¬deep of·¬cesspool ꜝbe·generated·yourself of·what ¬stronger you·are ꜝbe·¬come and ꜝbe·¬slept with of·¬uncircumcised⁺ in to·¬midst of·trauma-deads⁺ °¬swords⁺

22 there Assour and all ⁼the ⁼¬synagogue of·him all⁺ ⁼trauma-deads⁺ there they·were·given and the ⁼¬burial of·them in to·¬deep of·¬cesspool and was·been·generated the ⁼¬synagogue of·him ¬surrounding of·the ⁼¬tomb of·him all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼trauma-deads⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·¬collapsed to·¬sword

23 the⁺ ⁼giving °the ⁼¬fear of·them upon of·earth ⁼life

24 there ¬Elamite and all ⁼the ⁼ability of·him ¬surrounding of·the ⁼¬tomb of·him all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼trauma-deads⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·¬collapsed to·¬sword and the⁺ ⁼¬coming ⁼¬uncircumcised⁺ to of·earth °¬depth the⁺ ⁼having·given of·them °¬fear upon of·earth ⁼life and they·took °the ⁼¬torment of·them with of·the⁺ ⁼¬coming to °¬cesspool

25 in to·¬midst of·trauma-deads⁺

26 there they·were·given Mosoch and Thobel and all ⁼the ⁼¬strength of·them ¬surrounding of·the ⁼¬tomb of·him all⁺ ⁼trauma-deads⁺ of·him all⁺ ⁼¬uncircumcised⁺ ⁼trauma-deads⁺ off °¬swords⁺ the⁺ ⁼having·given °the ⁼¬fear of·them upon of·earth ⁼life

27 and they·were·¬slept with of·the⁺ ⁼¬giants⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·¬collapsed off of·eternity which⁺ they·¬came to of·¬hell in to·¬weapons⁺ ⁼¬warfare⁺ and they·¬placed °the⁺ ⁼¬swords⁺ of·them ¬by °the⁺ ⁼heads⁺ of·them and they·were·been·generated the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·them upon of·the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·them ¬that they·¬terrified °¬giants⁺ in to·earth of·life

28 and you in to·¬midst of·¬uncircumcised⁺ you·will·be·¬slept with of·having·been·traumatized to·¬sword

29 there they·were·given the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ Assour the⁺ ⁼giving °the ⁼¬strength of·him to °trauma °¬swords⁺ these⁺ with of·trauma-deads⁺ they·were·¬slept with of·¬coming to °¬cesspool

30 there the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·the ⁼¬north all⁺ ⁼¬officers⁺ Assour the⁺ ⁼¬coming ⁼trauma-deads⁺ wiŧh to·the ⁼¬fear of·them and to·the ⁼¬strength of·them they·were·¬slept ¬uncircumcised⁺ with of·trauma-deads⁺ °¬swords⁺ and they·¬carried·off °the ⁼¬torment of·them with of·the⁺ ⁼¬coming to °¬cesspool

31 °those⁺ will·¬see·himself king ⁼¬Pharaoh and will·be·¬pleaded upon °all ⁼the ⁼¬strength of·them says lord ⁼lord

32 ¬that I·have·given °the ⁼¬fear of·him upon of·earth ⁼life and will·be·¬slept in to·¬midst of·¬uncircumcised⁺ with of·trauma-deads⁺ °¬swords⁺ ¬Pharaoh and all ⁼the ⁼¬multitude of·him says lord ⁼lord

33 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

2 son of·human ꜝspeak to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the ⁼people of·you and you·will·¬say unto °them earth upon °which iᵮ I·¬bring·upon °¬sword and should·take the ⁼people of·the ⁼earth °human ⁼one out of·them and they·should·give °him to·¬selves⁺ to °¬goal

3 and should·¬see °the ⁼¬sword ⁼self-coming upon °the ⁼earth and should·trumpet to·the ⁼trumpet and should·signify to·the ⁼people

4 and should·hear the ⁼hearing °the ⁼voice of·the ⁼trumpet and ńot should·¬keep·himself and should·¬arrive the ⁼¬sword and should·¬grasp °him °the ⁼blood of·him upon of·the ⁼head of·him will·be·himself

5 ¬that °the ⁼voice of·the ⁼trumpet hearing not ¬kept·himself the ⁼blood of·him upon of·him will·be·himself and this ¬that ¬kept·himself °the ⁼soul of·him ¬took·out·himself

6 and the ⁼¬goal ifᵮ should·¬see °the ⁼¬sword ⁼self-coming and ńot should·signify to·the ⁼trumpet and the ⁼people ńot should·¬keep·himself and coming ⁼the ⁼¬sword should·take out of·them °soul this through °the·one of·¬self °¬lawlessness was·taken and °the ⁼blood out of·the ⁼hand of·the ⁼¬goal I·will·¬seek·out

7 and you son of·human °¬goal I·have·given °you to·the ⁼house of·Yisra’el and you·will·hear·yourself out of·mouth of·me °saying

8 in to·the·one to·¬say °me to·the ⁼¬sinful ⁼death you·will·be·put·to·death and ńot you·should·speak of·the·one to·self-¬keep °the·one °¬ungodly⁺ off of·the ⁼¬road of·him he ⁼the ⁼¬lawless to·the ⁼¬lawlessness of·him will·die·off·himself then °the ⁼blood of·him out of·the ⁼hand of·you I·will·¬seek·out

9 you then ifᵮ you·should·¬forewarn to·the ⁼¬ungodly °the ⁼¬road of·him of·the·one to·¬turn·away off of·her and ńot should·¬turn·away off of·the ⁼¬road of·him this to·the ⁼¬ungodlinessness of·him will·die·off·himself and you °the ⁼soul of·yourself you·have·¬taken·out·yourself

10 and you son of·human ꜝtell to·the ⁼house of·Yisra’el thus you⁺·spoke saying the⁺ ⁼¬errors⁺ of·us and the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·us upon to·us they·are and in to·them we we·¬melt·ourselves and ¬how?! we·will·live·ourselves

11 ꜝtell to·them I·live I* °¬these⁺ says lord not I·¬plan·myself °the ⁼death of·the ⁼¬ungodly as °the·one to·¬turn·away °the ⁼¬ungodly off of·the ⁼¬road of·him and to·live °him to·¬rejection ꜝ¬turn·away⁺ off of·the ⁼¬road of·you⁺ and so·that °what you⁺·die·off house of·Yisra’el

3 ¬¡see! °the ⁼milk you⁺·¬devour and °the⁺ ⁼¬wools⁺ you⁺·¬clothe·yourselves⁺ and °the ⁼¬robust you⁺·¬slaughter and °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·me not you⁺·¬feed

4 °the ⁼having·¬been·weak not you⁺·¬strengthened and °the·one evil °having not you⁺·¬rejuvenated and °the ⁼having·been·¬broken not you⁺·¬bandaged and °the ⁼self-¬leading·astray not you⁺·¬turned and °the ⁼having·¬destroyed not you⁺·¬sought and °the ⁼¬strong you⁺·¬workouted·yourselves⁺ to·¬toil
