4 through °this mountains⁺ of·Yisra’el ꜝhear⁺ °saying of·lord °¬these⁺ says lord to·the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ and to·the⁺ ⁼¬hills⁺ and to·the⁺ ⁼¬valleys⁺ and to·the⁺ ⁼¬brooks⁺ and to·the⁺ ⁼having·been·¬made·desolate and to·having·been·¬destroyed and to·the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬left·behind which⁺ they·were·generated·themselves to °¬plunder and to °¬trampling to·the⁺ ⁼¬left·behind to·nations⁺ ¬surrounding

5 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼lord if ¬certainly in to·fire of·¬wrath of·me I·spoke upon °the⁺ ⁼¬remaining⁺ ⁼nations⁺ and upon °the ⁼¬Idumea ⁼all ¬that they·gave °the ⁼earth of·me to·¬selves⁺ to °¬possession with of·¬joy ¬dishonoring °souls⁺ of·the·one to·¬destroy in to·¬plunder

6 through °this ꜝ¬prophesy upon °the ⁼earth of·the ⁼Yisra’el and ꜝtell to·the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ and to·the⁺ ⁼¬hills⁺ and to·the⁺ ⁼¬valleys⁺ and to·the⁺ ⁼¬groves⁺ °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! I* in to·the ⁼zealousy of·me and in to·the ⁼¬wrath of·me I·spoke anti of·the·one °¬reproaches⁺ of·nations⁺ to·¬bear °you⁺

7 through °this I* I·will·¬take·up °the ⁼hand of·me upon °the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬surrounding of·you⁺ these⁺ °the ⁼¬dishonour of·them they·will·take·themselves

8 of·you⁺ then mountains⁺ of·Yisra’el °the ⁼¬grape and °the ⁼fruit of·you⁺ will·¬devour·himself the ⁼people of·me ¬that they·¬come·near of·the·one to·come

9 ¬that ¬¡see! I* upon °you⁺ and I·will·¬look·upon upon °you⁺ and you⁺·will·be·¬workouted and you⁺·will·be·seeded

10 and I·will·¬multiply upon °you⁺ °humans⁺ °all °house of·Yisra’el to °¬goal and they·will·be·¬dwelled the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ and the ⁼having·been·¬layed·waste will·be·¬built

11 and I·will·¬multiply upon °you⁺ °humans⁺ and °¬animals⁺ and I·will·¬settle °you⁺ as °the·one in to·¬beginning of·you⁺ and ¬well I·will·do °you⁺ ¬just·as °the·ones⁺ ¬before of·you⁺ and you⁺·will·know·yourselves⁺ ¬that I* I·am lord

12 and I·will·engender upon °you⁺ °humans⁺ °the ⁼people of·me °Yisra’el and they·will·¬inherit °you⁺ and you⁺·will·be·yourselves⁺ to·them to °¬possession and not ńot you⁺·should·be·¬added ¬still to·be·¬been·barren off of·them

13 °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼lord anti of·which⁺ they·told to·you ¬devouring °humans⁺ you·are and having·self-¬been·barren ¬by of·the ⁼nation of·you you·were·generated·yourself

14 through °this °humans⁺ ¬not·any·more you·will·¬eat·yourself and °the ⁼nation of·you not you·will·¬be·barren ¬still says lord ⁼lord

15 and not will·be·heard ¬not·any·more upon °you⁺ ¬dishonour of·nations⁺ and °¬reproaches⁺ of·peoples⁺ not ńot you⁺·should·¬carry·up says lord ⁼lord

16 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

17 son of·human house of·Yisra’el ¬dwelled upon of·the ⁼earth of·them and they·¬stained °her in to·the ⁼¬road of·them and in to·the⁺ ⁼idols⁺ of·them and in to·the⁺ ⁼¬impurities⁺ of·them ¬according·to °the ⁼¬impurity of·the ⁼self-¬sitting·apart was·been·generated the ⁼¬road of·them ¬before of·¬face of·me

18 and I·¬poured·out °the ⁼¬wrath of·me upon °them

19 and I·¬scattered °them to °the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ and I·¬crushed °them to °the⁺ ⁼¬countries⁺ ¬according·to °the ⁼¬road of·them and ¬according·to °the ⁼sin of·them I·judged °them

20 and they·came·to to °the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ of·which they·came·to there and they·¬profaned °the ⁼name of·me °the ⁼holy in to·the·one to·self-say °them people of·lord these⁺ and out of·the ⁼earth of·him they·have·come·out

21 and I·¬spared·myself of·them through °the ⁼name of·me °the ⁼holy ⁼which they·¬profaned house of·Yisra’el in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ of·which they·came·to there

22 through °this ꜝtell to·the ⁼house of·Yisra’el °¬these⁺ says lord not to·you⁺ I* I·do house of·Yisra’el but or through °the ⁼name of·me °the ⁼holy ⁼which you⁺·¬profaned in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ of·which you⁺·came·to there

23 and I·will·make·holy °the ⁼name of·me °the ⁼great ⁼the ⁼¬profaned in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ °which you⁺·¬profaned in to·¬midst of·them and they·will·know·themselves the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ ¬that I* I·am lord in to·the·one to·be·made·holy °me in to·you⁺ ¬according·to °¬eyes⁺ of·them

24 and I·will·take·myself °you⁺ out of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ and I·will·¬gather °you⁺ out of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬lands⁺ and I·will·¬bring·in °you⁺ to °the ⁼earth of·you⁺

25 and I·will·¬sprinkle upon °you⁺ °water ⁼¬clean and you⁺·will·be·¬cleaned off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬impurities⁺ of·you⁺ and off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼idols⁺ of·you⁺ and I·will·¬clean °you⁺

26 and I·will·give to·you⁺ °heart ⁼¬new and °breath ⁼¬new I·will·give in to·you⁺ and I·will·¬remove °the ⁼heart ⁼the ⁼stone out of·the ⁼flesh of·you⁺ and I·will·give to·you⁺ °heart ⁼fleshly

27 and °the ⁼breath of·me I·will·give in to·you⁺ and I·will·do so·that in to·the⁺ ⁼¬righteous·acts⁺ of·me you⁺·should·¬travel·yourselves⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼judgments⁺ of·me you⁺·should·¬keep·yourselves⁺ and you⁺·should·do

28 and you⁺·will·¬dwell upon of·the ⁼earth ⁼which I·gave to·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ and you⁺·will·be·yourselves⁺ to·me to °people and I* I·will·be·myself to·you⁺ to °God

29 and I·will·¬save °you⁺ out of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬impurities⁺ of·you⁺ and I·will·call °the ⁼¬grain and I·will·¬multiply °him and not I·will·give upon °you⁺ °¬famine

30 and I·will·¬multiply °the ⁼fruit of·the ⁼¬wood and °the⁺ ⁼¬offsprings⁺ of·the ⁼field ¬that ńot you⁺·should·take °¬reproach of·¬famine in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺

31 and you⁺·will·be·¬remembered °the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·you⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬evil⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬practices⁺ of·you⁺ °the·ones⁺ ńot °good⁺ and you⁺·will·¬be·angry ¬according·to °¬face of·them in to·the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·you⁺ and upon to·the⁺ ⁼¬abominations⁺ of·you⁺

32 not through °you⁺ I* I·do says lord ⁼lord known will·be·himself to·you⁺ ꜝbe⁺·¬been·ashamed and ꜝ¬cause·shame⁺ out of·the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·you⁺ house of·Yisra’el

33 °¬these⁺ says lord in to·day ⁼which I·will·¬clean °you⁺ out of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·you⁺ and I·will·¬settle °the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ and they·will·be·¬built the⁺ ⁼¬deserteds⁺

34 and the ⁼earth ⁼the ⁼having·been·¬destroyed will·be·worked anti of·which⁺ ¬that having·been·¬destroyed was·been·generated ¬according·to °¬eyes⁺ of·all ⁼¬travelling·by

35 and they·will·¬say the ⁼earth ⁼that ⁼the ⁼having·been·¬destroyed was·been·generated as ¬garden of·¬self-indulgence and the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬deserteds⁺ and having·been·¬destroyed and having·been·¬ruined ⁼¬fortified⁺ they·¬seated

36 and they·will·know·themselves the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ iᵮ they·should·be·¬left·behind ¬surrounding of·you⁺ ¬that I* lord I·¬built °the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬taken·down and I·¬planted °the⁺ ⁼having·been·¬destroyed I* lord I·spoke and I·will·do

37 °¬these⁺ says lord ¬still °this I·will·be·¬sought to·the ⁼house of·Yisra’el of·the·one to·do to·them I·will·¬multiply °them as °sheep⁺ °humans⁺

38 as °sheep⁺ ⁼holy⁺ as °sheep⁺ of·Yerushalam in to·the⁺ ⁼¬festivals⁺ of·her thus they·will·be·themselves the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬deserteds⁺ ⁼¬full⁺ of·sheep⁺ of·humans⁺ and they·will·know·themselves ¬that I* lord

37 and was·generated·himself upon °me* hand of·lord and ¬led·out °me in to·breath lord and ¬placed °me in to·¬midst of·the ⁼¬plain and this was ¬full of·bones⁺ of·human⁺

2 and ¬took °me upon °them ¬around ¬surrounding and ¬¡see! many⁺ ¬very upon of·¬face ⁼the ⁼¬plain ¬dried·up⁺ ¬very

3 and told unto °me son of·human if will·live·himself the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ ⁼these⁺ and I·told lord you you·should·¬know·yourself °these⁺

4 and told unto °me ꜝ¬prophesy upon °the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ ⁼these⁺ and you·will·¬say to·them the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬dried·up⁺ ꜝhear⁺ °saying of·lord

5 °¬these⁺ says lord to·the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ ⁼these⁺ ¬¡see! I* I·¬bear to °you⁺ °breath of·life

6 and I·will·give upon °you⁺ °¬nerves⁺ and I·will·¬lead upon °you⁺ °fleshes⁺ and I·will·¬stretch·out upon °you⁺ °leather and I·will·give °breath of·me to °you⁺ and you⁺·will·live·yourselves⁺ and you⁺·will·know·yourselves⁺ ¬that I* I·am lord

7 and I·¬prophesied ¬as ¬ordered·himself to·me and was·generated·himself in to·the·one °me* to·¬prophesy and ¬¡see! ¬earthquake and ¬brought·near the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ ¬each·other unto °the ⁼¬joint of·it

8 and I·¬saw and ¬¡see! upon °them ¬nerves⁺ and fleshes⁺ they·¬grew·themselves and ¬ascended upon °them leather ¬above and breath not was in to·them

9 and told unto °me ꜝ¬prophesy son of·human ꜝ¬prophesy upon °the ⁼breath and ꜝtell to·the ⁼breath °¬these⁺ says lord out of·the⁺ ⁼four⁺ ⁼breaths⁺ ꜝcome and ꜝ¬breathe·into to °the⁺ ⁼corpses⁺ ⁼these⁺ and ꜝlet·live⁺

10 and I·¬prophesied ¬as ¬ordered·himself to·me and came·to to °them the ⁼breath and they·lived and they·stood upon of·the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·them ¬synagogue ⁼much ¬very

11 and spoke lord unto °me saying son of·human the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ ⁼these⁺ all ⁼house of·Yisra’el is and they they·say ¬dried·up⁺ has·been·generated the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·us has·¬destroyed the ⁼¬hope of·us we·have·¬dissented

12 through °this ꜝ¬prophesy and ꜝtell °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! I* I·¬open of·you⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬tombs⁺ and I·will·¬lead °you⁺ out of·the⁺ ⁼¬tombs⁺ of·you⁺ and I·will·¬bring·in °you⁺ to °the ⁼earth of·the ⁼Yisra’el

13 and you⁺·will·know·yourselves⁺ ¬that I* I·am lord in to·the·one to·¬open °me °the⁺ ⁼¬graves⁺ of·you⁺ of·the·one to·¬lead °me out of·the⁺ ⁼¬graves⁺ °the ⁼people of·me

14 and I·will·give °the ⁼breath of·me to °you⁺ and you⁺·will·live·yourselves⁺ and I·will·¬place·myself °you⁺ upon °the ⁼earth of·you⁺ and you⁺·will·know·yourselves⁺ ¬that I* lord I·have·spoken and I·will·do says lord

15 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

16 son of·human ꜝtake to·yourself °¬rod and ꜝwrite upon °her °the ⁼Yudah and °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el °the·ones⁺ ¬??? upon °him and °¬rod ⁼second you·will·take·yourself to·yourself and you·will·write °her to·the ⁼Yosef °¬rod of·¬Ephraim and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el °the⁺ ⁼¬added unto °him

17 and you·will·¬join·together °them unto °one·another⁺ to·yourself to °¬rod ⁼one of·the·one to·¬bind °them and they·will·be·themselves in to·the ⁼hand of·you

18 and will·be·himself ¬when they·should·say unto °you the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the ⁼people of·you not you·will·¬announce to·us °what is these⁺ to·you

19 and you·will·¬say unto °them °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! I* I·will·take·myself °the ⁼¬tribe of·Yosef °the·one through of·hand of·¬Ephraim and °the⁺ ⁼¬tribes⁺ of·Yisra’el °the⁺ ⁼self-¬joining·up·with unto °him and I·will·give °them upon °the ⁼¬tribe of·Yudah and they·will·be·themselves to °¬rod ⁼one in to·the ⁼hand of·Yudah

20 and they·will·be·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬rods⁺ upon to·which⁺ you you·wrote upon to·them in to·the ⁼hand of·you ¬before of·them

21 and you·will·¬say to·them °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼lord ¬¡see! I* I·take °all ⁼house of·Yisra’el out of·¬midst of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ of·which they·came·to there and I·will·¬assemble °them off of·all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬surrounding of·them and I·will·¬bring·in °them to °the ⁼earth of·the ⁼Yisra’el

22 and I·will·give °them to °nation ⁼one in to·the ⁼earth of·me and in to·the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ of·Yisra’el and ¬ruler ⁼one will·be·himself of·them and not they·will·be·themselves ¬still to two °nations⁺ not·then ńot they·should·be·¬distributed ¬not·any·more to two °kingdoms⁺

23 so·that ńot they·should·¬stain·themselves ¬still in to·the⁺ ⁼idols⁺ of·them and I·will·¬rescue·myself °them off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·them ⁼which⁺ they·sinned in to·them and I·will·¬clean °them and they·will·be·themselves to·me to °people and I* lord I·will·be·myself to·them to °God

24 and the ⁼servant of·me David ⁼¬ruler in to·¬midst of·them and ¬flocksman ⁼one will·be·himself of·all⁺ ¬that in to·the⁺ ⁼¬orders⁺ of·me they·will·¬travel·themselves and °the⁺ ⁼judgments⁺ of·me they·will·¬keep·themselves and they·will·do °them

25 and they·will·¬dwell upon of·the ⁼earth of·them °which I* I·have·given to·the ⁼servant of·me to·Ya‘aqob of·which they·¬dwelled there the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·them and they·will·¬dwell upon of·her they and David ⁼the ⁼servant of·me ¬ruler of·them will·be·himself to °the ⁼eternity

26 and I·will·¬make·a·covenant·myself to·them °¬covenant of·peace ¬covenant ⁼eternal will·be·himself with of·them and I·will·¬place °the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ of·me in to·¬midst of·them to °the ⁼eternity

27 and will·be·himself the ⁼¬dwelling·place of·me in to·them and I·will·be·myself to·them God and they of·me they·will·be·themselves people

28 and they·will·know·themselves the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ ¬that I* I·am lord ⁼the ⁼making·holy °them in to·the·one to·be °the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ of·me in to·¬midst of·them to °the ⁼eternity

38 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

2 son of·human ꜝ¬establish °the ⁼¬face of·you upon °¬Gog and °the ⁼earth of·the ⁼¬Magog °¬ruler Rōs Mosoch and Thobel and ꜝ¬prophesy upon °him

3 and ꜝtell to·him °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼lord ¬¡see! I* upon °you °¬Gog ⁼¬ruler Rōs Mosoch and Thobel

4 and I·will·¬assemble °you and °all ⁼the ⁼ability of·you °horses⁺ and °horsemen⁺ ⁼having·been·¬put·on ⁼¬breastplates⁺ ⁼all⁺ ¬synagogue ⁼much ¬small·shields⁺ and ¬helmets⁺ and ¬swords⁺

5 Persai and Ethiopians⁺ and Libues ⁼all⁺ to·¬helmets⁺ and to·¬small·shields⁺

6 Gomer and all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ about °him house of·the·one ¬??? off of·¬last ⁼¬north and all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ about °him and nations⁺ ⁼many⁺ with of·you

7 ꜝbe·¬made·ready ꜝ¬make·ready °yourself you and all ⁼the ⁼¬synagogue of·you the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬assembled with of·you and you·will·be·yourself to·me to °¬advance·guard

8 off of·days⁺ ⁼¬greater⁺ will·be·¬made·ready and upon of·¬last of·years⁺ will·come·himself and will·¬come to °the ⁼earth ⁼the ⁼having·self-¬turned·away off °¬swords⁺ of·having·self-¬assembled off of·nations⁺ ⁼many⁺ upon °earth of·Yisra’el which was·been·generated ¬deserted through of·¬all and this out of·nations⁺ has·come·out and they·will·¬dwell upon of·peace ¬all⁺

9 and you·will·¬ascend·yourself as ¬rain and you·will·¬come as cloud to·¬cover °earth and you·will·be·yourself you and all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ about °you and nations⁺ ⁼many⁺ with of·you

10 °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼lord and will·be·himself in to·the ⁼day ⁼that will·¬ascend·himself ¬declarations⁺ upon °the ⁼heart of·you and you·will·¬count·yourself °¬thoughts⁺ ⁼¬evil⁺

11 and you·will·¬say I·will·¬ascend·myself upon °earth ⁼having·been·¬thrown·off I·will·¬come upon °¬·quiet in to·¬quietness and °¬dwelling upon of·peace °all⁺ ⁼¬dwelling °earth in to·which not ¬is·already wall not·then ¬bars⁺ and ¬doors⁺ not they·are to·them

12 to·¬despoil °¬plunder and to·¬despoil °¬plunders⁺ of·them of·the·one to·¬turn °hand of·you to °the ⁼having·been·¬layed·waste which was·¬settled and upon °nation ⁼having·self-¬assembled off of·nations⁺ ⁼many⁺ °having·done °¬possessions⁺ °¬dwelling upon °the ⁼¬anavel of·the ⁼earth

13 Saba and Daidan and ¬traders⁺ Karchēdonioi and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬villages⁺ of·them they·will·¬say to·you to °¬plunder of·the·one to·¬despoil you you·should·come·yourself and to·¬despoil °¬plunders⁺ you·¬assembled °¬synagogue of·you to·take °silver and °gold to·self-¬carry·off °¬possession of·the·one to·¬despoil °¬plunders⁺

14 through °this ꜝ¬prophesy son of·human and ꜝtell to·the ⁼¬Gog °¬these⁺ says lord not in to·the ⁼day ⁼that in to·the·one to·be·¬settled °the ⁼people of·me °Yisra’el upon of·peace you·will·be·¬arisen

15 and you·will·¬come out of·the ⁼¬place of·you off of·¬last ⁼¬north and nations⁺ ⁼many⁺ with of·you ¬riders⁺ of·horses⁺ all⁺ ¬synagogue ⁼great and ability ⁼much

16 and you·will·¬ascend·yourself upon °the ⁼people of·me °Yisra’el as cloud to·¬cover °earth upon of·¬last⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ will·be·himself and I·will·¬lead °you upon °the ⁼earth of·me so·that they·should·know all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ °me* in to·the·one to·be·made·holy °me in to·you ¬before of·them

17 °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼lord to·the ⁼¬Gog you you·are about of·which I·spoke ¬before of·days⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬before through of·hand of·the⁺ ⁼servants⁺ of·me of·¬prophets⁺ of·the ⁼Yisra’el in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ ⁼those⁺ and to·years⁺ of·the·one to·¬bring °you upon °them

18 and will·be·himself in to·the ⁼day ⁼that in to·day ⁼which iᵮ should·come ¬Gog upon °the ⁼earth of·the ⁼Yisra’el says lord ⁼lord will·¬ascend·himself the ⁼¬wrath of·me

19 and the ⁼zealousy of·me in to·fire of·the ⁼¬wrath of·me I·spoke if ¬certainly in to·the ⁼day ⁼that will·be·himself ¬earthquake ⁼great upon of·earth of·Yisra’el

20 and they·will·be·¬shaken off of·¬face of·lord the⁺ ⁼fishes⁺ of·the ⁼sea and the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ of·the ⁼heaven and the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼¬plain and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬reptiles⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬crawling upon of·the ⁼earth and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ upon of·¬face of·the ⁼earth and will·be·¬thrown·violently the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ and they·will·¬collapse·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬valleys⁺ and all ⁼wall upon °the ⁼earth will·¬collapse·himself

21 and I·will·call upon °him °all °¬fear says lord ¬sword of·human upon °the ⁼brother of·him will·be·himself

22 and I·will·judge °him to·death and to·blood and to·¬rain ⁼¬flooding and to·stones⁺ of·¬hail and °fire and °¬divine I·will·¬rain·down upon °him and upon °all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ with of·him and upon °nations⁺ ⁼many⁺ with of·him

23 and I·will·be·¬magnified and I·will·be·made·holy and I·will·be·¬been·glorified and I·will·be·known ¬in·front·of of·nations⁺ ⁼many⁺ and they·will·know·themselves ¬that I* I·am lord

39 and you son of·human ꜝ¬prophesy upon °¬Gog and ꜝtell °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! I* upon °you °¬Gog ⁼¬ruler Rōs Mosoch and Thobel

2 and I·will·¬assemble °you and ¬??? °you and I·will·¬pull·up °you off of·¬last ⁼the ⁼¬north and I·will·¬lead °you upon °the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ of·the ⁼Yisra’el

3 and I·will·¬destroy °the ⁼¬bow of·you off of·the ⁼hand of·you of·the ⁼¬left and °the⁺ ⁼¬bows⁺ of·you off of·the ⁼hand of·you of·the ⁼¬right and I·will·¬lay °you

4 upon °the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ of·Yisra’el and you·will·¬collapse·yourself you and all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ about °you and the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ with of·you they·will·be·given to °¬multitudes⁺ of·¬hens⁺ to·all ⁼wingling and to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼¬plain I·have·given °you to·be·¬devoured

5 upon of·¬face ⁼the ⁼¬plain you·will·¬collapse·yourself ¬that I* I·spoke says lord

6 and I·will·mission·off °fire upon °¬Gog and they·will·be·¬dwelled the⁺ ⁼¬islands⁺ upon of·peace and they·will·know·themselves ¬that I* I·am lord

7 and the ⁼name of·me the ⁼holy will·be·known in to·¬midst of·people of·me of·Yisra’el and not will·be·¬profaned the ⁼name of·me the ⁼holy ¬not·any·more and they·will·know·themselves the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ ¬that I* I·am lord ⁼holy in to·Yisra’el

8 ¬¡see! ¬comes and you·will·know·yourself ¬that will·be·himself says lord ⁼lord this is the ⁼day in to·which I·spoke

9 and they·will·come·out·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling °the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·Yisra’el and they·will·¬kindle in to·the⁺ ⁼¬weapons⁺ to·¬small·shields⁺ and to·¬shafts⁺ and to·¬bows⁺ and to·¬bows⁺ and to·¬rods⁺ of·hands⁺ and to·¬spears⁺ and they·will·¬kindle in to·them °fire seven °years⁺

10 and not ńot they·should·take °¬woods⁺ out of·the ⁼¬plain not·then ńot they·should·chop out of·the⁺ ⁼¬groves⁺ but or °the⁺ ⁼¬weapons⁺ they·will·¬burn to·fire and ¬??? °the⁺ ⁼¬despoiling °them and they·will·¬despoil °the⁺ ⁼¬despoiling °them says lord

11 and will·be·himself in to·the ⁼day ⁼that I·will·give to·the ⁼¬Gog °¬place ⁼¬famous °¬grave in to·Yisra’el °the ⁼¬cemetery of·the⁺ ⁼¬arriving unto to·the ⁼sea and ¬??? °the ⁼¬cleft of·the ⁼¬valley and they·will·¬bury there °the ⁼¬Gog and °all ⁼the ⁼¬multitude of·him and will·be·called the ⁼¬??? ⁼the ⁼¬cemetery of·the ⁼¬Gog

14 and °men⁺ through of·all they·will·¬give·orders °self-¬coming °the ⁼earth to·¬bury °the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬left·behind upon of·¬face of·the ⁼earth to·¬clean °her with °the ⁼¬of·seven·months and they·will·¬seek·out

16 and for the ⁼name of·the ⁼city ¬cemetery and will·be·¬cleaned the ⁼earth

17 and you son of·human ꜝtell °¬these⁺ says lord ꜝtell to·all ⁼¬bird ⁼wingling and unto °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼¬plain ꜝbe⁺·¬assembled and ꜝcome⁺·yourselves⁺ ꜝbe⁺·¬assembled off of·all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬surrounding upon °the ⁼¬sacrifice of·me °which I·have·¬sacrificed to·you⁺ °¬sacrifice ⁼great upon °the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ of·Yisra’el and you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ °meats⁺ and you⁺·will·drink·yourselves⁺ °blood

18 °meats⁺ of·¬giants⁺ you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ and °blood of·¬rulers⁺ of·the ⁼earth you⁺·will·drink·yourselves⁺ °¬rams⁺ and °calves⁺ and °¬he-goats⁺ and the⁺ ⁼calves⁺ ⁼having·been·¬grown·fat ⁼all⁺

23 and they·will·know·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ ¬that through °the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·them they·were·¬taken·captive house of·Yisra’el anti of·which⁺ they·¬rejected to °me* and I·¬turned·away °the ⁼¬face of·me off of·them and I·¬delivered °them to °hands⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬enemies⁺ of·them and they·¬collapsed all⁺ to·¬sword

25 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼lord now I·will·¬turn·away °the ⁼¬captivity of·Ya‘aqob and I·will·¬have·mercy °the ⁼house of·Yisra’el and I·will·be·zealous through °the ⁼name ⁼the ⁼holy of·me

22 of·¬altar ⁼¬wooden to·¬cubits⁺ of·three⁺ °the ⁼¬height of·him and °the ⁼¬length to·¬cubits⁺ two and °the ⁼¬breadth to·¬cubits⁺ two and °horns⁺ had and the ⁼¬foot of·him and the⁺ ⁼walls⁺ of·him ¬wooden⁺ and told unto °me this ⁼the ⁼¬table ⁼the·one ¬before of·¬face of·lord

23 and two ¬doorways⁺ to·the ⁼temple and to·the ⁼holy

24 two ¬doorways⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼two⁺ ⁼¬doorways⁺ to·the·ones⁺ to·¬turnings⁺ two ¬doorways⁺ to·the ⁼one and two ¬doorways⁺ to·the ⁼¬door ⁼the ⁼second

25 and ¬carving upon of·them and upon °the⁺ ⁼¬doorways⁺ of·the ⁼temple ¬Cherubs⁺ and ¬palms⁺ ¬according·to °the ⁼¬carving of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ and ¬eager⁺ ⁼¬woods⁺ ¬according·to °¬face of·the ⁼¬Elamite ¬outside

26 and ¬windows⁺ ⁼¬hidden⁺ and ¬measured·out ¬in and ¬in to °the⁺ ⁼¬roofings⁺ of·the ⁼¬Elamite and the⁺ ⁼¬sides⁺ of·the ⁼house having·been·¬joined·together

42 and ¬led·out °me to °the ⁼¬palace ⁼the ⁼¬outer ¬according·to °¬easts⁺ ¬before of·the ⁼gate ⁼the·one unto °¬north and ¬brought·in °me and ¬¡see! ¬inner·chambers⁺ five self-having of·the ⁼¬left·over and self-having of·the ⁼¬determining unto °¬north

2 upon °¬cubits⁺ hundred °¬length unto °¬north and °the ⁼¬width fifty of·¬cubits⁺

3 having·self-¬circumscribed °which ⁼¬way the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·the ⁼¬palace ⁼the ⁼¬inner and °which ⁼¬way the⁺ ⁼¬peristyles⁺ of·the ⁼¬palace ⁼the ⁼¬outer ¬??? ¬facing⁺ ⁼¬Porticos⁺ ⁼¬third·rank⁺

4 and ¬before of·the⁺ ⁼¬inner·chambers⁺ ¬promenade to·¬cubits⁺ ten °the ⁼¬width upon °¬cubits⁺ hundred °the ⁼¬length and the⁺ ⁼¬doorways⁺ of·them unto °¬north

5 and the⁺ ⁼¬promenades⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬upper·rooms⁺ ¬likewise ¬that ¬protruded·himself °the ⁼¬peristyle out of·him out of·the·one ¬from·beneath of·¬peristyle and the ⁼¬interval thus ¬peristyle and ¬interval and thus ¬Porticos⁺

6 ¬because ¬triple⁺ they·were and °pillars⁺ not they·had ¬as the⁺ ⁼pillars⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬outer⁺ through °this ¬??? of·the·ones⁺ ¬from·beneath and of·the⁺ ⁼¬midst⁺ off of·the ⁼earth

8 ¬that the ⁼¬length of·the⁺ ⁼¬inner·chambers⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼looking to °the ⁼¬palace ⁼the ⁼¬outer to·¬cubits⁺ fifty and these⁺ they·are ¬facing⁺ to·these⁺ the ⁼all to·¬cubits⁺ hundred

9 and the⁺ ⁼¬doors⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬inner·chambers⁺ ⁼these⁺ of·the ⁼¬entry ⁼the·one unto °¬easts⁺ of·the·one to·self-¬enter through of·them out of·the ⁼¬palace ⁼the ⁼¬outer

10 ¬according·to °the ⁼light of·the·one in to·¬beginning of·¬promenade and the·ones⁺ unto °¬south ¬according·to °¬face of·the ⁼¬south ¬according·to °¬face of·the ⁼¬left·over and ¬according·to °¬face of·the ⁼¬determining ¬inner·chambers⁺

11 and the ⁼¬promenade ¬according·to °¬face of·them ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼¬measures⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬inner·chambers⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ unto °¬north and ¬according·to °the ⁼¬length of·them and ¬according·to °the ⁼¬breadth of·them and ¬according·to °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬departures⁺ of·them and ¬according·to °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬conversions⁺ of·them and ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼lights⁺ of·them and ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼¬doorways⁺ of·them

12 ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬inner·chambers⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ unto °¬south and ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼¬doorways⁺ off of·¬beginning of·the ⁼¬promenade as upon °light of·¬interval of·¬reed and ¬according·to °¬easts⁺ of·the·one to·self-¬enter through of·them

13 and told unto °me the⁺ ⁼¬inner·chambers⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ unto °¬north and the⁺ ⁼¬inner·chambers⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ unto °¬south the⁺ ⁼being ¬according·to °¬face of·the⁺ ⁼¬intervals⁺ these⁺ they·are the⁺ ⁼¬inner·chambers⁺ of·the ⁼holy in to·which⁺ they·will·¬eat·themselves there the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Zadok the⁺ ⁼¬coming·near unto °lord °the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ and there they·will·¬place °the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ and °the ⁼¬sacrifice and °the·ones⁺ about of·sin and °the·ones⁺ about of·¬ignorance ¬because the ⁼¬place ⁼holy

14 not they·will·come·to·themselves there ¬besides of·the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ not they·will·come·out·themselves out of·the ⁼holy to °the ⁼¬palace ⁼the ⁼¬outer ¬that through of·all holy⁺ they·should·be the⁺ ⁼¬bringing·near and ńot they·should·touch·themselves of·the ⁼¬uniform of·them in to·which⁺ ⁼¬ministering in to·them ¬because holy is and they·will·¬put·on·themselves °cloaks⁺ ⁼óther⁺ ¬when they·should·touch·themselves of·the ⁼people

15 and was·¬completed the ⁼¬measurement of·the ⁼house ¬inwardly and ¬led·out °me ¬according·to °¬road of·the ⁼gate ⁼the ⁼looking unto °¬easts⁺ and ¬measured·out °the ⁼¬example of·the ⁼house ¬around in to·¬disposition

18 and ¬turned unto °sea and ¬measured·out °the·one ¬according·to °¬face of·the ⁼sea °five·hundred⁺ in to·the ⁼¬reed of·the ⁼¬measure

19 and ¬turned unto °¬south and ¬measured·out ¬before of·the ⁼¬south °five·hundred⁺ in to·the ⁼¬reed of·the ⁼¬measure

20 °the⁺ ⁼four⁺ ⁼¬parts⁺ of·the of·him ⁼¬reed and ¬directed °him and °¬enclosure of·them ¬surrounding of·five·hundred⁺ unto °¬easts⁺ and of·five·hundred⁺ to·¬cubits⁺ °¬breadth of·the·one to·¬give·orders ¬each °¬midst of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ and ¬each °¬midst of·the ⁼¬area·around·a·wall ⁼the·one in to·¬disposition of·the ⁼house

43 and ¬brought °me upon °the ⁼gate ⁼the ⁼looking ¬according·to °¬easts⁺ and ¬led·out °me

2 and ¬¡see! ¬glory of·God ⁼Yisra’el came·himself ¬according·to °the ⁼¬road of·the ⁼gate ⁼the ⁼looking unto °¬easts⁺ and voice of·the ⁼¬barracks as voice of·¬repeating ⁼many⁺ and the ⁼earth ¬shined·out as ¬brightness off of·the ⁼¬glory ¬around

3 and the ⁼¬appearance °which I·¬saw ¬according·to °the ⁼¬appearance ⁼which I·¬saw when I·¬entered·myself of·the·one to·christen °the ⁼city and the ⁼¬appearance of·the ⁼¬chariot ⁼which I·¬saw ¬according·to °the ⁼¬appearance ⁼which I·¬saw upon of·the ⁼¬river ⁼the·one Chobar and I·¬collapse upon °¬face of·me

4 and ¬glory of·lord came·to to °the ⁼house ¬according·to °the ⁼¬road of·the ⁼gate ⁼the ⁼looking ¬according·to °¬easts⁺

5 and ¬took·up °me breath and ¬brought·in °me to °the ⁼¬palace ⁼the ⁼¬inner and ¬¡see! ¬full of·¬glory of·lord the ⁼house

6 and I·stood and ¬¡see! voice out of·the ⁼house ⁼speaking unto °me and the ⁼man had·stood self-having of·me

7 and told unto °me you·have·¬seen son of·human °the ⁼¬place of·the ⁼throne of·me and °the ⁼¬place of·the ⁼¬track of·the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·me in to·which⁺ will·¬dwell the ⁼name of·me in to·¬midst of·house ⁼Yisra’el °the ⁼eternity and not they·will·¬profane ¬not·any·more house of·Yisra’el °the ⁼name ⁼the ⁼holy of·me they and the⁺ ⁼self-¬governing of·them in to·the ⁼fornication of·them and in to·the⁺ ⁼murders⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼self-¬governing in to·¬midst of·them

8 in to·the·one to·¬place °them °the ⁼¬threshold of·me in to·the⁺ ⁼¬thresholds⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼¬doorways⁺ of·me °self-having of·the⁺ ⁼¬doorways⁺ of·them and they·gave °the ⁼wall of·me as °self-¬holding myˊ and of·them and they·¬profaned °the ⁼name ⁼the ⁼holy of·me in to·the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·them to·which⁺ they·did and I·¬obliterated °them in to·¬wrath of·me and in to·murder

9 and now ꜝlet·¬reject⁺·themselves °the ⁼fornication of·them and °the⁺ ⁼murders⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼self-¬governing of·them off myˊ and I·will·¬dwell in to·¬midst of·them °the ⁼eternity

10 and you son of·human ꜝ¬show to·the ⁼house of·Yisra’el °the ⁼house and they·will·¬abate off of·the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·them and °the ⁼¬appearance of·him and °the ⁼¬disposition of·him

11 and they they·will·take·themselves °the ⁼¬punishment of·them about of·all⁺ ⁼which⁺ they·did and you·will·¬circumscribe °the ⁼house and °the⁺ ⁼¬departures⁺ of·him and °the ⁼¬confidence of·him and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬orders⁺ of·him and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼law⁺ of·him you·will·make·known to·them and you·will·¬circumscribe ¬in·front·of of·them and they·will·¬keep·themselves °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬righteous·acts⁺ of·me and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬orders⁺ of·me and they·will·do °them

22 and to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼second they·will·take·themselves °¬goats⁺ two of·¬goats⁺ °¬blameless⁺ ¬above °sins⁺ and they·will·¬appease·themselves °the ⁼¬altar ¬as they·¬appeased·themselves in to·the ⁼calf

23 and with °the·one to·¬complete °you °the ⁼¬making·an·atonement they·will·¬bring·to °calf out of·¬oxes⁺ °¬blameless and °¬ram out of·sheep⁺ °¬blameless

24 and you⁺·will·¬bring·to ¬in·front·of of·lord and they·will·¬throw·on the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ upon °them °¬salt and they·will·¬carry·up °them ⁼¬burnt·offerings⁺ to·the ⁼lord

25 seven °days⁺ you·will·do °¬goat ¬above °sins⁺ ¬according·to °day and °calf out of·¬oxes⁺ and °¬ram out of·sheep⁺ °¬blameless⁺ they·will·do

27 and will·be·himself off of·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼eighth and ¬beyond they·will·do the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ upon °the ⁼¬altar °the⁺ ⁼¬burnt·offerings⁺ of·you⁺ and °the·ones⁺ of·the ⁼¬saving of·you⁺ and I·will·¬wait·for·myself °you⁺ says lord

44 and ¬turned °me ¬according·to °the ⁼¬road of·the ⁼gate of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ of·the ⁼¬outer ⁼the ⁼looking ¬according·to °¬easts⁺ and this was having·been·¬shut

2 and told lord unto °me the ⁼gate ⁼this ⁼having·been·¬shut will·be·himself not will·be·¬opened and no·one ńot should·¬pass·through through of·her ¬that lord ⁼the ⁼God of·the ⁼Yisra’el will·come·to·himself through of·her and will·be·himself having·been·¬shut

3 ¬because the ⁼self-¬governing ⁼this will·¬lower·himself in to·her of·the·one to·¬eat °bread ¬in·front·of of·lord ¬according·to °the ⁼¬road of·¬Elamite of·the ⁼gate will·come·to·himself and ¬according·to °the ⁼¬road of·him will·come·out·himself

4 and ¬brought·in °me ¬according·to °the ⁼¬road of·the ⁼gate ⁼the·one unto °¬north ¬before of·the ⁼house and I·¬saw and ¬¡see! ¬full of·¬glory the ⁼house of·lord and I·¬collapse upon °¬face of·me

6 and you·will·¬say unto °the ⁼house ⁼the ⁼¬rebelling unto °the ⁼house of·the ⁼Yisra’el °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼the ⁼God ꜝlet·them·¬qualify·himself to·you⁺ off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·you⁺ house of·Yisra’el

7 of·the·one to·¬bring·in °you⁺ °sons⁺ ⁼¬foreign⁺ ⁼¬uncircumcised⁺ to·heart and °¬uncircumcised⁺ to·flesh of·the·one to·self-be·generated in to·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ of·me and they·¬profaned °them in to·the·one to·¬bring·to °you⁺ °breads⁺ °¬fat and °blood and you⁺·¬transgressed °the ⁼¬covenant of·me in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·you⁺

11 and they·will·be·themselves in to·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ of·me ¬ministering ⁼¬gatekeepers⁺ upon of·the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·the ⁼house and ¬ministering to·the ⁼house these⁺ they·will·¬slaughter °the⁺ ⁼¬burnt·offerings⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬sacrifices⁺ to·the ⁼people and these⁺ they·will·stand·themselves ¬in·front·of of·the ⁼people of·the·one to·¬minister to·them

12 anti of·which⁺ they·¬ministered to·them ¬before of·¬face of·the⁺ ⁼idols⁺ of·them and was·generated·himself to·the ⁼house of·Yisra’el to °¬punishment of·¬unrighteousness ¬because·of of·this I·¬took·up °the ⁼hand of·me upon °them says lord ⁼the ⁼God

13 and not they·will·¬come·near unto °me of·the·one to·be·priest to·me not·then of·the·one to·¬bring·near unto °the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ of·sons⁺ of·the ⁼Yisra’el not·then unto °the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ of·me and they·will·take·themselves °¬dishonour of·them in to·the ⁼¬delusion ⁼which they·were·¬led·astray

14 and ¬??? °them to·¬keep °¬prisons⁺ of·the ⁼house to °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·him and to °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ iᵮ they·should·do

15 the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the ⁼¬Zadok whos⁺ they·¬kept·themselves °the⁺ ⁼¬prisons⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ of·me in to·the·one to·self-¬lead·astray °house of·Yisra’el off myˊ these⁺ they·will·¬bring·near unto °me of·the·one to·¬minister to·me and they·will·stand·themselves ¬before of·¬face of·me of·the·one to·¬bring·to to·me °¬sacrifice °¬fat and °blood says lord ⁼the ⁼God

16 these⁺ they·will·come·to·themselves to °the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ of·me and these⁺ they·will·come·unto·themselves unto °the ⁼¬table of·me of·the·one to·¬minister to·me and they·will·¬keep °the⁺ ⁼¬prisons⁺ of·me

17 and will·be·himself in to·the·one to·self-¬enter °them °the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·the ⁼¬palace ⁼the ⁼¬inner °robes⁺ ⁼¬of·flaxen·linen⁺ they·will·¬put·on·themselves and not they·will·¬put·on·themselves ¬??? in to·the·one to·¬minister °them off of·the ⁼gate ⁼the ⁼¬inner ⁼¬palace

18 and °¬turbans⁺ ⁼¬of·flaxen·linen⁺ they·will·have upon to·the⁺ ⁼heads⁺ of·them and °¬pants⁺ ⁼¬of·flaxen·linen⁺ they·will·have upon °the⁺ ⁼¬loinses⁺ of·them and not they·will·¬gird·themselves to·¬force

19 and in to·the·one to·self-¬depart °them to °the ⁼¬palace ⁼the ⁼¬outer unto °the ⁼people they·will·¬strip·themselves °the⁺ ⁼robes⁺ of·them in to·which⁺ they they·¬minister in to·them and they·will·¬place °them in to·the⁺ ⁼¬inner·chambers⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ and they·will·¬put·on·themselves °robes⁺ ⁼óther⁺ and not ńot they·should·make·holy °the ⁼people in to·the⁺ ⁼robes⁺ of·them

20 and °the⁺ ⁼heads⁺ of·them not they·will·¬shave·themselves and °the⁺ ⁼¬hairs⁺ of·them not ¬??? ¬covering they·will·¬cover °the⁺ ⁼heads⁺ of·them

21 and °wine not ńot they·should·drink all ⁼priest in to·the·one to·self-¬enter °them to °the ⁼¬palace ⁼the ⁼¬inner

22 and °widow and °having·been·thrown·out not they·will·take·themselves to·¬selves⁺ to °woman but or °virgin out of·the ⁼seed of·Yisra’el and widow ifᵮ should·be·generated·himself out of·priest they·will·take·themselves

23 and °the ⁼people of·me they·will·¬teach ¬each °¬midst of·holy and of·¬profane and ¬each °¬midst of·¬unclean and of·¬clean they·will·make·known to·them

24 and upon °judgment of·blood these⁺ they·will·¬approach·themselves of·the·one to·¬judge °the⁺ ⁼¬righteous·acts⁺ of·me they·will·¬justify and °the⁺ ⁼judgments⁺ of·me they·will·judge and °the⁺ ⁼law⁺ of·me and °the⁺ ⁼¬orders⁺ of·me in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬festivals⁺ of·me they·will·¬keep·themselves and °the⁺ ⁼shabbats⁺ of·me they·will·make·holy

25 and upon °soul of·human not they·will·come·to·themselves of·the·one to·be·¬stained but or upon to·father and upon to·mother and upon to·son and upon to·daughter and upon to·brother and upon to·sister of·him which not has·been·generated to·man will·be·¬stained

26 and with °the·one to·be·¬cleaned °him seven °days⁺ will·¬count·out to·him

27 and to·which iᵮ to·day they·should·¬enter·themselves to °the ⁼¬palace ⁼the ⁼¬inner of·the·one to·¬minister in to·the ⁼holy they·will·¬bring·to °¬propitiation says lord ⁼the ⁼God

28 and will·be·himself to·them to °¬inheritance I* ¬inheritance to·them and ¬possession to·them not will·be·given in to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬that I* ¬possession of·them

29 and °the⁺ ⁼¬sacrifices⁺ and °the·ones⁺ ¬above °sins⁺ and °the·ones⁺ ¬above °¬ignorances⁺ these⁺ they·will·¬eat·themselves and all ⁼¬separation in to·the ⁼Yisra’el to·them will·be·himself

30 ¬firstfruitses⁺ of·all⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬firstborn⁺ of·all⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬choice·portions⁺ ⁼all⁺ out of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬firstfruitses⁺ of·you⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ will·be·himself and °the⁺ ⁼¬first·produces⁺ of·you⁺ you⁺·will·give to·the ⁼priest of·the·one to·¬place °¬praises⁺ of·you⁺ upon °the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·you⁺

31 and all ⁼¬decaying·flesh and ¬taken·by·wild·beasts out of·the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ and out of·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ not they·will·¬eat·themselves the⁺ ⁼priests⁺

45 and in to·the·one to·self-¬measure·out °you⁺ °the ⁼earth in to·¬inheritance you⁺·will·¬separate °¬firstfruits to·the ⁼lord °holy off of·the ⁼earth five and twenty °thousands⁺ °¬length and °¬breadth twenty °thousands⁺ holy will·be·himself in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ of·him ¬around

2 and will·be·himself out of·this to °¬sanctification five·hundred⁺ upon °five·hundred⁺ °¬square ¬around and ¬cubits⁺ fifty °¬interval to·him ¬around

3 and out of·this ⁼the ⁼¬measurement you·will·¬measure·out °¬length five and twenty °thousands⁺ and °¬breadth ten °thousands⁺ and in to·her will·be·himself the ⁼¬sanctification holy⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺

4 off of·the ⁼earth will·be·himself to·the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬ministering in to·the ⁼holy and will·be·himself to·the⁺ ⁼¬coming·near to·¬minister to·the ⁼lord and will·be·himself to·them ¬place to °houses⁺ ⁼having·self-¬separated to·the ⁼holiness of·them

5 twenty and five thousands⁺ °¬length and °¬breadth ten thousands⁺ will·be·himself to·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬ministering to·the ⁼house to·them to °¬possession °cities⁺ of·the·one to·¬dwell

6 and °the ⁼¬possession of·the ⁼city you·will·give five °thousands⁺ °¬breadth and °¬length five and twenty °thousands⁺ °which ⁼¬way the ⁼¬firstfruits of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ to·all ⁼house of·Yisra’el they·will·be·themselves

7 and to·the ⁼self-¬governing out of·this and off of·this to °the⁺ ⁼¬firstfruitses⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ to °¬possession of·the ⁼city ¬according·to °¬face of·the⁺ ⁼¬firstfruitses⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ and ¬according·to °¬face of·the ⁼¬possession ⁼the ⁼city °the·ones⁺ unto °sea and off of·the·ones⁺ unto °sea unto °¬easts⁺ and °the ⁼¬length as one of·the⁺ ⁼¬parts⁺ off of·the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ unto °sea and °the ⁼¬length upon °the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ unto °¬easts⁺ of·the ⁼earth

8 and will·be·himself to·him to °¬possession in to·the·one of·Yisra’el and not they·will·¬oppress ¬not·any·more the⁺ ⁼self-¬guiding of·the ⁼Yisra’el °the ⁼people of·me and °the ⁼earth they·will·¬allot house of·Yisra’el ¬according·to °¬tribes⁺ of·them

9 °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼God ꜝlet·them·¬qualify·himself to·you⁺ the⁺ ⁼self-¬guiding of·the ⁼Yisra’el °¬unrighteousness and °¬misery ꜝ¬remove⁺·yourselves⁺ and °judgment and °¬justice ꜝdo⁺ ꜝ¬expel⁺ °¬tyranny off of·the ⁼people of·me says lord ⁼God

48 and these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼names⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬tribes⁺ off of·the ⁼¬beginning ⁼the·one unto °¬north ¬according·to °the ⁼¬part of·the ⁼¬descent of·the ⁼¬splitting upon °the ⁼¬entry of·the·one Ēmath of·¬palace of·the·one Ainan °¬region of·¬Damascus unto °¬north ¬according·to °¬part Ēmath of·¬palace and will·be·himself to·them the·ones⁺ unto °¬easts⁺ ¬until unto °sea Dan one

9 ¬firstfruits °which they·will·¬separate to·the ⁼lord °¬length five and twenty thousands⁺ and °¬breadth twenty and five thousands⁺

10 of·these⁺ will·be·himself the ⁼¬firstfruits of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ unto °¬north five and twenty thousands⁺ and unto °sea °¬width ten thousands⁺ and unto °¬easts⁺ °¬width ten thousands⁺ and unto °¬south °¬length twenty and five thousands⁺ and °the ⁼mountain of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ will·be·himself in to·¬midst of·it

11 to·the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·self-made·holy ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Zadok to·the⁺ ⁼¬keeping °the⁺ ⁼¬prisons⁺ of·the ⁼house whos⁺ not they·were·¬led·astray in to·the ⁼¬delusion of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el °which ⁼¬way they·were·¬led·astray the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺

12 and will·be·himself to·them the ⁼¬firstfruits ⁼having·self-given out of·the⁺ ⁼¬firstfruitses⁺ of·the ⁼earth holy of·holy⁺ off of·the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺

29 this ⁼the ⁼earth °which you⁺·will·throw in to·¬lot to·the⁺ ⁼¬tribes⁺ of·Yisra’el and these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬divisions⁺ of·them says lord ⁼God
